ESP.ORIGINAL: Another argument with Paul today. The man's refusing to budge over the recent pay dispute and I've even heard rumblings of unionism among the other workers. I've already spoken with members of the board and, given that DiON is still running through critical tests, it would be inadvisable to deal with the Chief Engineer or any critical workers at this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天又和保罗吵了一架。 这个人在最近的薪酬纠纷中拒绝让步，我甚至听说其他工人中有工会主义的传言。 我已经和董事会成员谈过了， 鉴于DiON仍在进行关键测试，现在处理总工程师或者任何关键工人都是不明智的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ... stupid bastard nearly blew sectors 4, 6 and 8 sky-high earlier today. We're only a week out from the first families coming in and they're behaving like a bunch of children with their heads in the sand. I don't know what Amedes' game is, but he's been spending more time down in mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...那个愚蠢的混蛋今天差点把4区、6区和8区炸上天。 首批家庭入住只有一周时间了，他们却像一群把头埋在沙子里的孩子一样。 我不知道阿梅德斯在玩什么把戏，但他最近一直待在主机房里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After speaking with the board, we've decided to enact a fallback scenario in the event of access issues. Three keys have already been privately sourced and I'm told they'll be dispatched later today... trusted families, but the Chief Engineer is still...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在与董事会沟通后，我们决定在出现访问问题时执行备用方案。 三把钥匙已经私下获得，据说今天晚些时候会送来...... 都是可靠的家庭，但总工程师还是......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Final Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终日志

ESP.ORIGINAL: That stupid piece of shit. I hope you got the last laugh as the bombs fell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个愚蠢的混蛋。我希望炸弹落下时，你笑得出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ongoing War
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在进行的战争

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Reports of activity from Gomorrah along outer perimeter. The Omertas are fickle but with continued support from the Van Graffs, these attempts will prove to be little more than distractions.
I have already made it exceedingly clear to the Omertas that the Garden is not to be subsumed into whatever plans those imbeciles are scheming up next. They shall be bled dry, if that's what it takes, before they see the error of their ways.
House can play whatever games he likes, the operations here will not bow to anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT:
蛾摩拉外围传来活动报告。黑手党虽然反复无常，但在范·格拉夫家族的持续支持下，这些尝试不过是些小打小闹。
我已经向黑手党明确表明，乐园不会屈从于那些白痴接下来的任何计划。 如果必要的话，我会让他们血本无归，直到他们认识到自己的错误。
豪斯可以随意玩他的游戏，但这里的行动不会向任何人屈服。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maria
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛利亚

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Older Hispanic woman, mid 40s. She appears to have finally understood her increasing decline. Since agreed to significantly lower wages and clients to do with her as they please.
Large breasts provides some enticement to clientele, but likely to be unusable in the near future. Reynes may need to intervene should she start begging again to stay.
ESP.TRADUIT:
中年西班牙裔女性，年约四十余。 她似乎终于意识到了自己日益衰老的处境，因此同意大幅降低薪资，并任由客户摆布。
她丰满的胸部或许仍能为她吸引一些顾客，但恐怕这一优势也即将丧失。 若她再次开始乞求留下，雷恩斯或许需要介入处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gabriel
ESP.TRADUIT: 加百列

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Insufferable flirt, but he has proven successful with both men and women. Large penis provides ample pleasure and he has no qualms about anal stimulation or group work either.
He appears to understand the nature of his role, but must keep an eye on his demeanour should he step out of line again.
Nevertheless, uncanny skill with his tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT:
调情技巧令人难以忍受，但事实证明他在对男人和女人上都很成功。 巨大的鸡吧提供了充足的乐趣，他对肛交或群交也没有任何犹豫。
他似乎很清楚自己的角色定位，但一旦行为出格，就必须严加管教。
不过，他的口技确实非同凡响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Final Message
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终消息

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Lucy always said I spend too much time round machines. Guess she was right.
I don't really know who I'm writing this for. For all I care, these people can choke when the oxygen filters give out. Let them get a taste of what it's like to be down here in the muck.
Working on DiON though makes it all worthwhile. Give it time. A few decades. A few centuries. Eventually, these people will grow soft, let their guard down. And that's when the central mainframe will begin to gradually decay.
It'll be subtle at first. I designed it exactly the way I planned. There's no waiting this world out anymore. It's time for these people to get out there and see what they've wrought.
Overseer Walters will be coming to dismiss me from this place soon. I don't know what the future holds, but I'm glad it won't be easy for them. I wouldn't want a spot here anyway.
This is the final log of Chief Engineer Paul Amedes, dated October 20 2077. Delilah, baby Lucille... I want to spend however much time I have left with you. Should any of this survive into the future, well... I think it's easier to just let it be forgotten. Let me, let everything be forgotten. It's better that way.
Godspeed, gentlemen. We few, we happy few, we band of brothers.
ESP.TRADUIT:
露西总说我在机器上花太多时间。我想她是对的。
我真的不知道我在为谁写这些。 反正，这些人要是氧气过滤器失效了，这些人会窒息而死。 就让他们也尝尝在这泥潭里挣扎的滋味吧。
不过，研究DiON让这一切都变得值得。 给它点时间。几十年。几百年。 这些人终究会变得软弱，放松警惕。 到那时，中央主机就会开始逐渐崩溃。
一开始会很微妙。我完全是按计划设计的。这个世界已经没有耐心等待了。 是时候让这些人出去看看他们的所作所为了。
监督员沃尔特斯很快就会来让我离开这里了。 我不知道未来会怎样，但我很高兴他们不会过得轻松。反正我也不想留在这里。
这是首席工程师保罗·阿梅德斯的最后日志，日期是2077年10月20日。 迪莉拉，小露西尔......我想把剩下的时间都和你们一起度过。 如果这段文字有幸流传到未来......我想，最好还是让它被遗忘吧。让我，让一切都被遗忘。这样更好。
祝各位好运，先生们。即使敌众我寡，我等却亲如兄弟

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jane
ESP.TRADUIT: 简

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Late teens, a street rat that was picked up by chance from Freeside. Pretty, but boring in range of services. Insists on contraception, despite lower wages as a result.
Religious beliefs could prove advantageous in level of service the Garden provides, but longevity is unlikely. Too soft.
Addendum: Scheduled for discipline following attempted escape. Attending guards welcome to do with her as they please.
ESP.TRADUIT:
十几岁的少女，曾是自由城的街头混混，偶然间被带走。 她长得漂亮，但服务范围单调乏味。她坚持避孕，尽管这导致她的工资降低了。
她的宗教信仰或许能为她在乐园提供的服务中带来一些优势，但她的生命或许不会长久。 她太软弱了。
附录：她因试图逃跑而被安排接受纪律处分。警卫可以随意处置她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mathus
ESP.TRADUIT: 马图斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
More wild animal than man. Nevertheless, he has proven to be quite successful with particular clients looking for more physical interactions. Psycho addiction is easy to maintain and appears to increase virility.
Must remind patrons that the Garden does not provide further support as a result.
ESP.TRADUIT:
他更像野兽而不是人。 然而，事实证明，他在与特定客户进行更多身体互动方面相当成功。 他的心理成瘾很容易维持，并且似乎能增强性欲。
必须提醒顾客，乐园不提供进一步的后果支持。

ESP.ORIGINAL: From Mercy
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自梅西

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I fucking hate you. I wish you were here so I could kill you myself.
What happened to the two of us taking on the world together? What happened to never giving up on the family business? You promised me, Des. YOU PROMISED ME.
I can't stand being in this house. I can't stand the way Louisa looks at me, the way father drools on himself now and spends most of the day sleeping. What the fuck happened to us? Where did it go so wrong?
I wish you were here, brother. I wish I'd been the one in your place.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我他妈恨死你了。我希望你在这儿，这样我就能亲自杀了你。
我们两个一起征服世界的日子都去哪儿了？永不放弃家族事务又去哪儿了？ 你答应过我，德斯。你答应过我。
我无法忍受待在这个房子里。 我无法忍受路易莎看我的方式，父亲现在整天流口水，大部分时间都在睡觉。 我们到底怎么了？是哪里出了问题？
我希望你在这里，兄弟。我希望我能代替你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: RECOVERED LOG 374-A5
ESP.TRADUIT: 恢复日志374-A5

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It finally happened. The business is finally in my hands. Mercy too, of course, but Father called the two of us in. One of his attendants made the mistake of looking up to enquire, but I gave them a beating for the offense.
The House has good things coming its way. And now it's all mine. Sis and I are going to take this world by storm.
ESP.TRADUIT:
终于实现了。家族事业终于掌握在我手中。 当然，还有梅西手中，父亲把我们两个都叫来了。 他的一个侍从犯了个错误，抬头询问，我为此打了他们一顿。
这个家会有好事发生。而现在，这一切都是我的。 我和梅西要征服这个世界。

ESP.ORIGINAL: RECOVERED LOG 886-Z7
ESP.TRADUIT: 恢复日志886-Z7

ESP.ORIGINAL:
First time meeting face-to-face with one of those Securitron freaks today. Usually the robots keep to themselves, but it had the gall to stop me while approaching the gate near Freeside. Louisa was alert enough to stop things getting out of hand, but I don't trust those things one bit. Machines can be broken.
On the plus side, arrangements with the Families have been made. Lorandis may be playing the long game, but we are in no short supply of bodies. Naturally, I made sure the price was fair to match.
ESP.TRADUIT:
今天第一次面对面遇到那个电子保安怪胎。 通常这些电子保安都独来独往，但它竟然有胆量在接近自由城附近的大门时拦住我。 路易莎足够警觉，阻止了事情失控，我一点也不信任这些东西。 这机器可能是坏的。
好消息是，已经与各个家族达成了协议。 洛兰迪斯可能正在玩长期游戏，但我们也不缺少人手。 当然，我确保价格公平合理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: RECOVERED LOG 1U4-03
ESP.TRADUIT: 恢复日志1U4-03

ESP.ORIGINAL:
There has been grumbling amongst the slaves recently about food. Some of the guard were quick enough to help them learn their place, but it is true the recent drought has made acquiring a steady supply difficult.
Some bigwig from down south came by looking for some bodies to work the chain gangs back home. It's amazing how quick the NCR is to change its tune when faced with the realities out here. The rep even had the gall to put up some protest at our offer, but Mercy helped him see the error of his ways.
ESP.TRADUIT:
最近奴隶们对食物有所抱怨。一些警卫很快就让他们知道了自己的位置，但最近的干旱确实使得稳定供应变得困难。
有个南方的大人物过来，想找些人去他们那边工作。 面对这里的现实，NCR改变态度的速度真是惊人。 代表对我们的提议表示抗议，但梅西帮助他认识到了自己的错误。

ESP.ORIGINAL: RECOVERED LOG 673-1Q
ESP.TRADUIT: 恢复日志673-1Q

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Perhaps I'm reading too much into it, but I sense Father has been growing... distant. He's not as focused as he used to be. Of course, sis and I have only been too happy to step in and pick up the slack, but I know Louisa can see it too.
The summer's been sweltering. Was it always this hot? I could use a bottle of Sunset right about now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
也许是我想得太多了，但我感觉父亲越来越......疏远了。 他不像以前那样亲密了。 当然，我和妹妹都很乐意插手并弥补这一空缺，但我知道路易莎也看到了这一点。
这个夏天一直很闷热。 以前有这么热吗？我现在真想来一瓶夕阳沙士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: RECOVERED LOG XC8-94
ESP.TRADUIT: 恢复日志XC8-94

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Long watch last night. Louisa brought it to my attention that something's happening among the slaves and even some of the guard seem on edge. I don't know what's going on here, but we can't afford anymore losses after the recent raids from the Legion.
Our family has spent too much, fought for too long, to see it all go to waste. I would rather die first. I won't disappoint you, Father.
ESP.TRADUIT:
昨天晚上值了很久的班。 路易莎提醒我，奴隶们之间发生了什么事，甚至有些警卫也显得紧张不安。 我不知道这里发生了什么，但在军团最近的袭击之后，我们不能再有任何损失了。
我们家族付出了太多，斗争了太久，不能眼睁睁地看着这一切付诸东流。 我宁愿先死。我不会让你失望的，父亲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glenda
ESP.TRADUIT: 格伦达

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Obese woman, mid 30s. Body is certainly an acquired taste, but appears to have developed a special relationship with a key baron from the south. Must watch for a way to leverage or, at the very least, maintain.
Child was successfully left by Reynes near Cottonwood Cove. Better that she believes coyotes got the boy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
中年肥胖妇女，三十多岁。 她的身体对别人当然是种特殊的嗜好，但似乎与南方的一位重要大亨建立了特殊关系。 必须寻找一种方法来利用他，或者至少维持这种关系。
雷恩斯在棉白杨湾附近成功留下了那个孩子。 最好让她相信是郊狼带走了那个男孩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jet
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Part-timer, but provides invaluable technical support to our specialised equipment. The ghoul is hardly personable, but the price for those willing to take a chance is more than acceptable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兼职人员，但为我们的专业设备提供了宝贵的技术支持。 这个尸鬼不太友善，但对于愿意冒险的人来说，这个价格还是可以接受的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintenance Log D-478A
ESP.TRADUIT: 维护日志D-478A

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure what the big wigs downstairs have planned, but it's been pretty routine so far. Everyone's been panicking since the news of Anchorage, but it's a whole lot of nothing. If you ask me, it's all going to blow over soon and I can finally get back to doing my damn job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道楼下的大人物们有什么计划，但到目前为止一切都很平常。 自从安克雷奇的消息传出后，每个人都人心惶惶，但其实是虚惊一场。 如果你问我，这一切很快就会平息，我终于可以回去做我的工作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintenance Log D-496E
ESP.TRADUIT: 维护日志D-496E

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The artificial intelligence they've been working on in Mainframe seems pretty high tech. I mean, I wouldn't trust this DiON to look after my kids or anything, but Vault-Tec certainly spares no expense.
Amedes treats the damn thing like it's his baby or something, but that's what a bit of green does to people, I guess. I wonder what the cost of that thing is anyway... certainly enough to get me through retirement. One of these days, I really gotta get myself a pay rise...
ESP.TRADUIT:
他们一直在主机房里研究的人工智能看起来相当高科技。 我是说，我不会信任DiON来照顾我的孩子或任何东西，但避难所科技确实不惜一切代价。
阿梅德斯把那该死的东西当作他的宝贝，但我想这就是钱对人的影响吧。 我想知道那个东西的成本是多少......肯定足够让我退休了。 总有一天，我真的得给自己加薪......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintenance Log D-889B
ESP.TRADUIT: 维护日志D-889B

ESP.ORIGINAL:
More news of the chinks is coming through each day. People seem pretty cut up about it, but Uncle Sam'll sort them out one way or another.
I was down fixing some pipes running through the sector bathroom yesterday when I overheard the Chief Engineer arguing with some more reps. Didn't quite catch the details, but he seemed pretty pissed off about something, the way he stormed off. Management, right? I fucking hate those guys.
ESP.TRADUIT:
每天都有更多关于中国人的消息传来。 人们似乎很担心，但山姆大叔会以某种方式解决他们。
我昨天在修理穿过区域浴室的水管时，无意中听到总工程师和一些代表在争吵。 我没有完全听清细节，但他似乎对某事感到非常愤怒，然后怒气冲冲地离开了。 管理层，对吧？我他妈讨厌那些家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintenance Log D-932V
ESP.TRADUIT: 维护日志D-932V

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Halloween's just around the corner. Bessie's gonna be stoked once I get the decorations up, but we're just about done with the finishing touches here.
Some of the families have started moving in and, I tell you, the shit they're carrying in is worth its weight in gold. Land of opportunity and all that, sure, but maybe I'll help myself to some of that if I get the chance. I could always use another car.
ESP.TRADUIT:
万圣节快到了。 贝茜看到装饰后会很兴奋的，我们在这里完成了最后的收尾工作。
一些家庭已经开始搬进来，实话说，他们带进来的东西价值连城。 真是充满机遇的地方，当然，但如果有机会的话，我也许会帮自己弄一些。 我总能再用一辆车。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gomorrah Rejects
ESP.TRADUIT: 蛾摩拉拒绝者

ESP.ORIGINAL: As result of ongoing hostilities with the Families, number of second-rate whores have been offered in performative attempts at appeasement. Usefulness of shaking their asses are unlikely to prove much in the long run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于与家族之间持续的敌对状态，许多二流妓女被用来作为缓和关系的表演性尝试。 从长远来看，摇臀摆尾的做法可能用处不大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfinished Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 未完成的日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fuck me, fuck this stupid wasteland and fuck that stupid fucking Radscorpion most of all.
Sure picked the best spot for a little exploration. That stupid bastard back at the Grub n' Gulp didn't tell me that the vault was locked up tighter than a nun's legs. Goddamn it. I knew this was a bad idea.
Suppose I could try my luck asking around some of the hubs. I've still got the coordinates hooked in, but the C-4 already cleared out most of my caps.
I'll think of something, I'm sure. I just need to lay down for a bit...
ESP.TRADUIT:
操他妈的，操他妈的这个愚蠢的废土，特别操他妈的那个愚蠢透顶的辐射蝎。
当然，这是探索的最佳地点。 那个该死的狼吞虎咽休息站里的混蛋没告诉我这个避难所比修女的腿还紧。 该死。我就知道这是个坏主意。
我想我可以在一些枢纽位置碰碰运气。我还保留着坐标，但C-4已经花光了我大部分的钱。
我一定会想出办法的。我只是需要躺一会儿......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dawn
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Black woman, mid 30s, although somewhat on the decline in appearance. Nevertheless, she remains useful with her experience with sado-masochistic clientele. Very lucrative.
Her attitude could use some adjustment, but it is within acceptable parameters, given the nature of her role. Signs of possible chain-smoking, an addiction could prove useful leverage in furthering her work.
ESP.TRADUIT:
中年黑人女性，尽管外貌有些衰老。 然而，她凭借与喜欢性虐恋的客户打交道的丰富经验，仍然很有价值，非常赚钱。
她的态度可能需要一些调整，但考虑到她的工作性质，这仍在可接受的范围内。 她可能有吸烟上瘾的迹象，这种瘾癖或许可以成为进一步推动她工作的有力助力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Passing the time
ESP.TRADUIT: 消磨时间

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm really lonely. I wish Howard got a place here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很孤单。我希望霍华德能在这里有个地方住。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ginger loves unicorns
ESP.TRADUIT: 金格喜欢独角兽

ESP.ORIGINAL: mama ask me to rite down here scholl is boring i want to go outside nd play but she said makem e sick NOT FAIR!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈让我写下来 学校好无聊 我想出去玩但她说我会生病 太不公平了！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sallow, E.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯沃洛, E.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Reportedly dubbed "Caesar" by new tribals rising across the river. Repeated visitor, although it has been years since he last made the journey. Unlikely to return given current events.
Talking with the girls reveals very little that could prove advantageous. Appears to enjoy talking on and on about something called Hegelian Dialectics. Multiple girls have fallen asleep in response.
ESP.TRADUIT:
据称，他被河对岸新崛起的部落尊称为“凯撒”。 他虽曾数次来访，但距上次造访已过去多年。 鉴于当前局势，他不太可能再回来了。
与女孩们交谈，几乎得不到什么有用的信息。 他似乎很喜欢没完没了地谈论一种叫做黑格尔辩证法的东西。 很多女孩在听他说话时都睡着了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Overview
ESP.TRADUIT: 概述

ESP.ORIGINAL: The home of tomorrow in your hands today! As a trusted member of the Vault-Tec family, you can enjoy the finest of luxury beneath the sunny sands of the Mojave Desert. This guide is available to all accepted members, attendants and applicable family members to ensure that your indefinite stay is still the very best!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，明日家园就在你的手中！ 作为避难所科技家族的信赖成员，你可以在莫哈维沙漠的阳光下享受最奢华的生活。 本指南适用于所有被接纳的成员、服务员和相关家庭成员，以确保您的无限期逗留依然是最好的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Navigation
ESP.TRADUIT: 导航

ESP.ORIGINAL: Error: Critical system failure. Vault Delta navigation currently offline. Please contact one of our friendly maintenance team for more information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 错误：系统关键故障。德尔塔避难所导航目前离线。 请联系我们的友好维护团队以获取更多信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Central Theatre
ESP.TRADUIT: 中央剧院

ESP.ORIGINAL: All residents are free to use the private theatre to watch the latest flicks: from quirky little comedies to pulse-pounding thrillers! (Note: Delta management encourages diligence for young families in the event underage audiences attempt to access mature content.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有居民都可以免费使用私人剧院观看最新的电影：从滑稽的喜剧到令人兴奋的惊悚片！ （注：德尔塔管理层鼓励年轻家庭在未成年观众试图访问成人内容时保持警惕。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swimming Pools
ESP.TRADUIT: 游泳池

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eager for some cardio, or are the kids being a bit restless? Get some fun in the artificial sun with our two Olympic-sized swimming pools! Two certified lifeguard attendants are available to attend around the clock, ask about our fun wave pool feature!
ESP.TRADUIT: 渴望做一些有氧运动，或者孩子们有点躁动不安？ 在我们的两个奥运会标准游泳池中享受人造阳光带来的乐趣吧！ 两名经过认证的救生员全天候待命，欢迎了解我们有趣的波浪池功能！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nightclub
ESP.TRADUIT: 夜总会

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is love in the air? Desperate to get away from the kids for a night? Hit the town just like you used to with our fully-equipped bar to enjoy the nightlife of Vault Delta!
ESP.TRADUIT: 空气中弥漫着爱情的气息吗？ 渴望摆脱孩子们度过一夜吗？ 就像你以前一样，在我们的全配酒吧享受德尔塔避难所的夜生活吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Quarters
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人住所

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Each and every member of the Vault-Tec family has been allocated state-of-the-art facilities for you and your loved ones to ride out the apocalypse in the best the company can offer!
With triple-filtered air quality, clean sheets twice a week and 24-hour assistance from the one-of-a-kind DiON artificial intelligence to attend to your every need, you won't ever want to leave!
ESP.TRADUIT:
避难所科技公司的每一位成员都已获得最先进的设施，为您和您的亲人提供公司所能提供的最佳避难所！
拥有三重过滤的空气质量、每周两次更换的干净床单，以及独一无二的DiON人工智能提供24小时服务， 满足您的每一个需求，您将再也不想离开！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Victor
ESP.TRADUIT: 维克多

ESP.ORIGINAL: Semi-sentient Securitron. Kept talking about some package he needed to ensure delivery of. Ultimately proved to be stubborn at our requests to refit with proper stimulation equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 半智能安保机器人。 一直在谈论他需要确保送达的某个包裹。 最终证明在我们要求他安装设备时他很固执。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oliver, L.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥利弗, L.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Disturbance caused by visits is outweighed by the caps and accompanying entourage he provides. Reynes and rest of security provided with double wages in advance of his arrival. No incidents as of yet.
His tastes provide opportunity for leverage. Appears to enjoy using his belt on girls for asphyxiation purposes. The resulting bruising is troubling, but within acceptable parameters. Any permanent damage would be paid back in kind.
ESP.TRADUIT:
他带来的瓶盖和随行人员足以抵消他到访带来的麻烦。 雷恩斯和其他安保人员在他到来之前都提前获得了双倍的工资。 到目前为止还没有发生任何意外。
他的喜好为我们提供了利用的机会。 他似乎喜欢用腰带对女孩进行窒息游戏。 虽然这样做造成的淤青令人担忧，但仍在可接受的范围内。 如果造成任何永久伤害，我们将以牙还牙，让他付出相应的代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry #1
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志条目#1

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got to say, I didn't think management could pull through, but I'm impressed. I can see myself settling in here quite nicely. Very nicely, indeed. Already, just earlier today, I've caught the eye of a cute little temptress named Mira. Play your cards right, Johnny Boy, and I'll have every woman in the vault at my beck and call soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得说，我原本没指望管理层能挺过来，但我现在很佩服他们。 我感觉自己在这里安顿得相当不错，确实相当不错。 就在今天早些时候，我已经吸引了一个名叫米拉的可爱小妖精的注意。 约翰尼，小伙子，只要你玩得好，我很快就会让避难所里的每个女人都听我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry #3
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志条目#3

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been a while since I've written in this thing. Don't really have much to say. Stupid bitch refused to have it aborted and I can see all the others round this sector staring at me like I've got the fucking plague. Idiots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经有一段时间没在这东西上写东西了。 其实没什么好说的。 那个蠢女人拒绝堕胎，我能看到周围这个区域的其他人都像看瘟疫一样看着我。 白痴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry #9
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志条目#9

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I ordered some champagne last night and one of those ridiculous machines waddled in after more than half an hour of waiting. Half an hour! If that wasn't bad enough, it tripped over itself and broke the glass all over the floor.
Now the shag carpet is soaked through and I have half a mind to go down to maintenance level to give those dregs a piece of my mind. They are too attend to OUR needs, for Christ's sake! If they don't want to, they should have stayed out there with the bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我昨晚点了一些香槟，结果那台可笑的机器在等了半个多小时后才蹒跚而来。 半个小时！这还不够糟糕吗？它竟然还把自己绊倒了，把玻璃摔了一地。 现在，我的长毛地毯全被泡湿了
我真想冲到维修层去教训那些混蛋一顿。 他们本该满足我们的需求，看在上帝的份上！ 如果他们不想，就应该和炸弹一起留在外面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry #17
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志条目#17

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something... quarters feel less safe than... repairs must be...
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么东西......住所感觉不太安全......必须进行维修......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry #18
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志条目#18

ESP.ORIGINAL: SOMEONE NEEDS TO... HEART OF THE PROBLE--
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人需要......问题的核心——

ESP.ORIGINAL: Update on outbreak
ESP.TRADUIT: 疫情更新

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Two bodies have been disposed of in light of the spread of syphilis among clients. By chance, we were fortunate enough to have a member of the Followers pass through who was able to provide medical examinations in exchange for his more peculiar tastes.
Must speak with Reynes to reiterate the consequences of failing personal hygiene checks. A repeat of these events could prove dire.
ESP.TRADUIT:
鉴于客户间梅毒的传播，我们已经处理了两具尸体。 幸运的是，我们碰巧遇到了一位信徒成员路过，他能够用他那更奇特的嗜好来换取医疗检查。
必须与雷恩斯谈谈，重申个人卫生检查不合格的后果。 如果此类事件再次发生，后果将不堪设想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: VAULT DELTA Directives
ESP.TRADUIT: 德尔塔避难所指令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This information is restricted under INDIGO-5 security privileges. Vault-Tec reminds all staff to watch for dissidents and the creeping taint of communist sympathisers.
In line with projected forecasts, VAULT-TEC CORPORATION and relevant authorities assume impending nuclear annihilation as a result of ongoing international hostilities. Current forecasts are for the fall of 2077 to the winter of 2078 at the latest.
You, honoured member of our ever-growing family, have been tasked with the following responsibilities:
1. Ensure the construction of Vault Designation DELTA in the allotted zone MD-621. This must be done with the utmost secrecy. Lethal force is authorised against trespassers, any subsequent paperwork is to be waived automatically.
2. Upon the completion of its construction, all members of the Vault-Tec upper management and executive team are to be accommodated into Vault Designation DELTA in line with current protocols. This includes personal attendants, immediate family members and one (1) pet per residence.
3. The installation of Project DiON is to be handled only by the responsible Chief Engineer, PAUL AMEDES, and the relevant authority. Congratulations on your appointment, Overseer!
4. Ensure the comfort and survival of all current and future generations at any expense. Regional tests - notably 11 - must not be interfered with under any circumstances. Vault Designation DELTA is assigned CONTROL group status. Food reserves and provided entertainment are projected to last three hundred (300) years.
5. In the event of contact with third-parties, it is recommended to keep Vault Designation DELTA secured against the outside world. VAULT-TEC CORPORATION reminds all its staff that communism is insidious and will survive any bomb.
6. Finally, in the event of overcrowding, PATHOGEN A6 is available to deploy in line with standard procedures. Maintenance departments have been equipped with lime-scented air fresheners and gas masks should it leak further within.
In line with other privatised vaults across the western seaboard, you are to be responsible for the survival of our species.
VAULT-TEC CORPORATION wishes to again congratulate you on your appointment, Overseer, as you prepare for the future!
ESP.TRADUIT:
此信息受INDIGO-5安全权限限制。 避难所科技公司提醒所有员工注意异见分子和共产主义同情者的渗透。 根据预测，避难所科技公司及相关部门认为，由于持续的国际敌对行动，即将发生核毁灭。 目前预测的时间为2077年秋季至2078年冬季。 您，我们日益壮大的家族中备受尊敬的一员，已被赋予以下职责：
1. 确保在指定区域MD-621内建造“DELTA”避难所。 此过程必须高度保密。可对擅入者使用致命武力，后续文件将自动豁免。 2. 在其建成后，避难所科技公司高层管理人员和执行团队的所有成员将按照当前协议入住“DELTA”避难所。 这包括私人随从、直系亲属以及每位居民携带的一只（1只）宠物。 3. DiON项目的安装仅由负责的首席工程师保罗·阿梅德斯和相关部门负责。祝贺您，监督者！ 4. 不惜一切代价确保当前和未来世代的舒适与生存。 在任何情况下都不得干扰区域测试，特别是第11次测试。“德尔塔“避难所被指定为控制组。 预计食物储备和娱乐设施将维持三百年（300年）。 5. 在与第三方接触时，建议保持“德尔塔”避难所对外界的封闭状态。 避难所科技公司提醒所有员工，共产主义是阴险的，将幸存于任何炸弹之下。 6. 最后，在发生人满为患的情况下，可按照标准程序部署病原体A6。 维护部门已配备石灰香味的空气清新剂和防毒面具，以防其进一步泄漏。
与西海岸其他私有避难所一样，您将负责我们种族的生存。
避难所科技公司再次祝贺您，监督者，祝您为未来做好准备！

ESP.ORIGINAL: May
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Farm-raised girl, reportedly from out Montana way. Early 20s, skin is very soft and supple. She is perfect for clients seeking a lighter touch and a more youthful, angelic body.
High level of empathy poses potential risk of forming attachment, undesirable given recent events. However, will likely continue to be incredibly popular among customers. Physical threshold must be ensured to protect the value she provides.
ESP.TRADUIT:
据说这个女孩是在蒙大拿州长大的农场女孩。 二十出头，皮肤非常柔软光滑。 她非常适合寻求轻柔触感和更年轻、天使身材的客户。
高度同理心可能带来形成依恋的风险，鉴于最近的事件，不期望再次发生。 然而，她很可能继续在客户中非常受欢迎。 必须确保她的身体承受力，以保护她所提供的价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who'd have thought... from a desk job taking insurance calls only a few months back to the seat of one of the best nuclear bunkers in North America. Nancy did always say I was destined for great things. I've got a good feeling about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁能想到......几个月前我还在办公室里接保险电话， 现在却坐在北美最好的核避难所之一的座位上。 南希总是说我有大好的前程。我对此感觉良好。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I don't know about this whole threat of nuclear war, but the folks up top have really pulled out the big guns for getting this place up and running. We should be getting the DiON mainframe installed next week, I was talking with Amedes earlier today and he ensured that it would be ready to fulfil all requirements.
The man's a bit headstrong for my liking, but he knows what he's doing. In any case, I've already notified the board that we are on track to meet projected milestones before the end of the year.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我不知道这场核战争的威胁到底有多大，但上面的人真的已经全力以赴让这个地方运转起来。 我们下周应该会安装DiON主机，我今天早些时候和阿梅德斯谈过，他确保它会满足所有要求。
这个人有点固执己见，但他知道自己在做什么。 无论如何，我已经通知董事会，我们有望在年底前达到预定的里程碑。

ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boo-yah, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，宝贝！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgh, I'm gonna get all that dirt!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我要把所有这些污垢都洗掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Kleen [050013FB] (mod) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_GREETING_0000D72D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand back and watch the magic happen...

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Kleen [050013FB] (mod) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_GREETING_0000D72E_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_GREETING_0000706D_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 猎人变成了猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_GREETING_0000706E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_GREETING_0000706F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way. I have nursed my hatred for long enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带路。我已经忍受我的仇恨很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_GREETING_00007070_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good riddance.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a tough fight, but you know what... I'm starting to feel a whole lot better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一场艰苦的战斗，但你知道吗......我开始感觉好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunBMisc_GREETING_000076BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon it's about time I reported back. The Legion's still out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候该回去报告了。军团还在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunBMisc_GREETING_000076C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every moment I spend here, it could be her last...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里度过的每一刻，都可能是她的最后一刻......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go away! I won't let you taunt me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走开！我不会让你取笑我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_00005D7E_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 她的痛苦不是一个笑话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_00005D7F_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_00005D80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you found anything? Janey must still be alive, I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到什么了吗？珍妮肯定还活着，我确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_00005D84_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069C7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 走路很痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't ever want to see this place again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再也不想看到这个地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me, my love. I won't let anyone get between us again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 待在我身边，我的爱人。我不会再让任何人介入我们之间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: R-right you are, Captain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，上尉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069CE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm right behind you, boss! No one will escape our surveillance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在你身后，老板！没人能逃脱我们的监视！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: W-what are your orders, commander?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的命令是什么，指挥官？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to be free of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想摆脱这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Coughs weakly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [虚弱地咳嗽]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We made it... I can't believe it! I didn't even think it was possible...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们做到了......真不敢相信！我甚至没想到这种可能......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much...
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't think I was going to make it out of there alive. You have my utmost gratitude, stranger... and to have Eli back as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到能活着离开这里。我对你感激不尽，陌生人......也很感谢把伊莱带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_GREETING_000069DA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got whatever you were looking for? Good, now fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到你要找的东西了吗？很好，现在滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_GREETING_000094EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_GREETING_000094F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_GREETING_000094F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So? What are you waiting for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么？你在等什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_GREETING_000094F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I didn't say I was here for chatting...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我可没说来这里是为了聊天的......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_GREETING_000094EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get what you need and go, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿到你需要的东西就走吧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_GREETING_000094F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: W-who... who are you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_000094FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was all that noise about? Where's Louisa?
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才那些噪音是怎么回事？路易莎在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_000094FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You remind me of someone, long ago...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我想起了很久以前的某个人......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_00009500_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: L-Louisa? Is that you? No... I'm terribly sorry... I didn't realise we had a visitor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路......路易莎？是你吗？不......非常抱歉......我没意识到我们有客人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_00009501_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hello again... what did you say your name was?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我们又见面了......你叫什么名字来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_00009521_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would so love to see the ocean again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想再看到大海......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_00009528_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you staying for dinner? I'm sure Louisa will prepare something nice...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要留下来吃晚饭吗？我相信路易莎会准备一些好吃的......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_00009529_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't seen my reading glasses, have you? I think I put them over there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没看到我的老花镜吧？我想我把它放在那边了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_GREETING_0000952A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this? Ah... greetings, honoured guest. Caesar's blessings be upon you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？啊......尊敬的客人，你好。凯撒的祝福与你同在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this? Another one of the Republic's whipping boys desperate to look where their eyes cannot see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？共和国的又一个替罪羊，渴望看到他们无法看到的东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How pitiful you must be to think you could just wander in here. Do you not fear death? Because Maximus will help you learn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真可悲，居然以为可以随便走进来。你不怕死吗？马克西姆斯会帮你领教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FE0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another buyer, or do you wish to surrender voluntarily? We can always use more meat for the pits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一位买家，还是你想自愿投降？我们总是需要更多的肉来填满那些坑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? What are you waiting for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么？你在等什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone's been a bit on edge since that bitch hurt Duport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从那个贱人伤了杜波特之后，大家都有点紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Idleness is a sin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 懒惰是一种罪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All will fall under the Legion's rule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人都将屈服于军团的统治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bull will conquer the Bear. This, in my heart, I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公牛将征服熊。这一点，我坚信不疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_GREETING_00006FFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't suppose you've got a bottle of vodka on you? Or three?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身上有伏特加吗？一瓶？还是三瓶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_GREETING_00007012_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Working here isn't always peachy, but at least I get some ass whenever I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里工作并不总是那么美好，但至少我想什么时候搞屁股都能搞到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_GREETING_00007013_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my advice: don't go near the slaves. Some of them still need to learn respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我的建议：别靠近奴隶。他们中的一些人还需要学会尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_GREETING_00007014_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_GREETING_00007015_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for, a kiss goodbye?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在等什么，一个吻别吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_GREETING_00007027_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_GREETING_00007028_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm too busy staring off into space to deal with your sorry ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太忙了，没空搭理你这个废物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_GREETING_00007029_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tourists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_GREETING_0000702A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I don't have...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_GREETING_00007036_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's paint the walls with their blood for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们换点花样，用他们的血来粉刷墙壁吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_GREETING_0000704D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking slavers...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的奴隶贩子......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_GREETING_0000704E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the Republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了共和国！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_GREETING_0000704F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I never see this place again, it'll still be too soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我再也看不到这个地方，那也太快了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_GREETING_00007050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's blessings be upon you. It is... good to see another uncorrupted by this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒的祝福与你同在。很高兴看到又一个没有被这个地方腐蚀的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003266_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the one the scouts speak of. Would that I was in the fieldand not beholden to the customs of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是侦察兵们谈论的那个人。但愿我能亲临战场，而不是受制于这个地方的习俗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003267_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. You will be rightfully flayed soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。你很快就会受到应有的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003267_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I care not for whatever drink or vice you bring before me. I will not lower myself to... this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你带来的任何酒水或恶习。我不会贬低自己去......这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003268_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May Caesar go with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿凯撒与你同在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_0000327D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would that I could burn this place to the ground..
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想把这个地方烧成灰烬......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_0000327E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every waking moment, I grow increasingly repulsed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每当我醒来时，我都感到越来越厌恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_0000327F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember that we are Legion, for we are many.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，我们是军团，因为我们人数众多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003280_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Begone. You and all the others here sicken me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚吧。你和这里的其他人都让我恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003281_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will burn, in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终将化为灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003282_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you wish to die? Keep talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想死吗？继续说啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003283_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Grunts.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [咕哝]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_GREETING_00003284_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I get you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道您有什么需要？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_GREETING_00003880_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurt any of the girls and you'll find out the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敢动任何一个女孩，你会尝到苦头的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_GREETING_00003891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't do charity work here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里不做慈善工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_GREETING_00003892_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you got the caps, I've got the goods. Well, not that kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有瓶盖，我就有货。不过，不是那种货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_GREETING_00003893_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever see Beatrix Russell in your travels, you tell her hello from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在路上见到比阿特克丽丝·拉塞尔，代我向她问好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_GREETING_00003894_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: H-hey man! Whatcha think of this place? Pretty great, huh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，老兄！你觉得这个地方怎么样？很棒吧，是吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_GREETING_00003898_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: H-h-hold on there, gorgeous! Where are you going with that fine piece of ass, huh? Come on, come gimme a kiss!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，嘿，站住，美女！你拿着你值钱的屁股要去哪儿，嗯？来吧，来给我一个吻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_GREETING_00003899_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can talk to me any time, hot stuff!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你随时都可以来找我，辣妹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_GREETING_000038B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: H-hey there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，那边！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_GREETING_000038B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another round on the house!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再来一轮，我请客！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_GREETING_000038BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I-is it just me... or is there two of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是只有我一个......还是你们两个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_GREETING_000038BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you'd come around. What can I get you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会来。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're ravenous, aren't you? But I can't go again so soon, baby... be patient. The pleasure will be all the more worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很饥渴吧？但我不能这么快就再来一次，宝贝......耐心点。快乐会更值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got good taste. So do I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很有品味。我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can we do for you, sweet thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能为你做些什么，甜心？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_GREETING_00003ECA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got me all hot and bothered...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我六神无主......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_GREETING_00003ECB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well... look at you, stirring up a fuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯......看看你，又在引起骚动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_GREETING_00003ECC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_GREETING_00003ECF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna try my special services, you've gotta go on the waiting list, same as everyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想试试我的特别服务，你得去排队，跟其他人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep yapping that mouth of yours and I will get the gimp mask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续唠叨，我就给你打上怪人标签。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to see some real fun, you should see Marty when someone gets too handsy with the girls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想看点真正的乐子，你应该看看马蒂是怎么对付那些对女孩动手动脚的人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buzz off already, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧滚吧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_GREETING_00003EE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well... look at this, Marty. What brings such a fine specimen as yourself over to little old me, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯......看看这个，马蒂。是什么风把你这样的优质样本吹到我这小老头这里来了，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_GREETING_000044DD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, darling... you've spent your whole life looking lost. But now you've found your way home to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，亲爱的......你一生都在寻找失去的东西。但现在你找到了回家的路，回到了我这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_GREETING_000044DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back for more? My, my... you have quite the appetite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回来要更多吗？哎呀，哎呀......你的胃口真不小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_GREETING_000044F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you worry about a thing now... you're among friends here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在不用担心任何事情......你在这里有朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_GREETING_000044F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brings you to ol' Gabriel, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么风把你吹到老加百列这里的，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_GREETING_000044F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Top, bottom, sideways... I can have you however I want...
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面、下面、侧面...我可以随心所欲地拥有你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_GREETING_000044F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came, you saw, now head back the other way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来过，你看过，现在回去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_GREETING_00004509_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_GREETING_00004516_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you here to shout me a beer or a girl, you can fuck right off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你是来请我喝酒或找姑娘的，否则你可以滚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_GREETING_00004517_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_GREETING_00004518_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cushy job, sure... but it's boring as brahmin shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 舒服的工作，当然......但无聊得像双头牛屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_GREETING_00004519_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could always try my luck with the Van Graffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是可以试着在范·格拉夫家族碰碰运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_GREETING_0000451A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's close enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe we're done here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们可以结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there something else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have enough to do as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经有足够多的事情要做了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Lorandis family wishes you a pleasant stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洛兰迪斯家族祝你住得愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I'm feeling tired all of a sudden...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我......我突然觉得累了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I crumbled... how... how did I crumble?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我屈服了......怎么......我怎么屈服了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's wrong... it's all wrong...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不对......一切都错了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you say your name was again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叫什么名字来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go bother someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去烦别人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_GREETING_00004B61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Sighs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [叹气]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_IdleChatter_00005D81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, Janey... this is all my fault...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，珍妮......这都是我的错......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_IdleChatter_00005D82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still here, huh? I always was a sucker...
ESP.TRADUIT: 还在这里，是吧？我一直是个傻瓜......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_IdleChatter_000094F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Snoozing, catches self.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [打盹，醒了过来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_IdleChatter_0000952B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ave... true to Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忠于凯撒......万岁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_IdleChatter_00006FFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck... I'm gonna fall asleep standing up like this...
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的......我要站着睡着了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_IdleChatter_00007016_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut the fuck up, soldier. Before I come back in there and take your other eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，士兵。在我回来挖掉你另一只眼睛之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_IdleChatter_0000702B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I think that was a rib...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我......我觉得那是根肋骨......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_IdleChatter_0000704C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As Caesar passed his trial, so too will I be delivered from this place...
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如凯撒通过了他的试炼，我也将从这个地方解脱......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_IdleChatter_00003285_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day, our banners will fly from the walls and order will be restored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天，我们的旗帜将从城墙上飘扬，秩序将得以恢复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_IdleChatter_00003286_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting too old for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经老得干不了这种破事儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_IdleChatter_00003895_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgh... I think I'm gonna throw up...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_IdleChatter_000038BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on a sec... where'd my caps go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下......我的瓶盖哪儿去了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_IdleChatter_000038BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, boys... don't make me feel all lonesome...
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，伙计们......别让我感觉这么孤单......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_IdleChatter_00003ECD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even my cigarette's shitty these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连我的烟都变得这么差劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_IdleChatter_00003EDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marty, another shot of whiskey, if you would...
ESP.TRADUIT: 马蒂，再来一杯威士忌，如果你愿意的话......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_IdleChatter_000044F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a few more hours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就剩几个小时了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_IdleChatter_0000451B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that you, Reynes? I trust you brought the right vintage this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你吗，雷恩斯?我相信你这次带对酒了吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_IdleChatter_00004B5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has been coming to you for far too long...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经等待这一刻太久了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_Attack_00007071_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the Romans crumbled, in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使是罗马，也终将崩塌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_Attack_00007072_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blood and flame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 血与火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_Attack_00007073_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_Attack_00007074_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will die, as will the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将死去，其他人也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_Attack_00007075_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am your end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是你的终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_Attack_00007076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone get in here and kill this son of a bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来个人进来把这混蛋杀了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_Attack_000063AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made a mistake crossing me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你犯了个错误，竟然敢惹我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_Attack_000063AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's going to be straight on the hooks for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你将会直接被挂在钩子上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_Attack_000063AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on! Come and get me! I'll rip out your fucking spine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧！来找我吧！我要把你的脊椎扯出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercy Guellan [0500BEFF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchMercyVT\SunC_Attack_000094CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one ever learns, do they?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从来没有人吸取教训，是吧？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercy Guellan [0500BEFF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchMercyVT\SunC_Attack_000094D0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you! Fuck all of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去死吧！你们全都去死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercy Guellan [0500BEFF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchMercyVT\SunC_Attack_000094D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had it all and you just had to come along and fuck it all up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们本来拥有一切，而你却偏偏要来把它全搞砸！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercy Guellan [0500BEFF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchMercyVT\SunC_Attack_000094D2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You son of a bitch! You'll pay for that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个混蛋！你会为此付出代价的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Attack_000094F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got some fight left in me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有力气战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Attack_000094F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll hurt you just the same!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你尝到同样的痛苦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Attack_000094F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Die, you piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去死吧，你这个垃圾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Attack_000094F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Degenerates like you belong on a cross!
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这样堕落的家伙就该被钉在十字架上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_Attack_00006FFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will burn! This whole world will burn!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会被烧死！整个世界都会被烧成灰烬！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_Attack_00006FFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To victory!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了胜利！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_Attack_00006FFE_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有个活的！

ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉他们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take 'em out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉他们!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_Attack_0000702D_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是为了我的兄弟们。

ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在你的坟墓上撒尿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_Attack_00007047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hostiles just ahead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人在前面！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_Attack_00007048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come and get me, you piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，你这个垃圾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_Attack_00007049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lock n' load!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上膛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_Attack_0000704A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll kill all of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要杀了你们所有人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_Attack_0000704B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First you and then the rest of this gods-forsaken hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 先是你，然后是这个该死的地狱里的其他人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_Attack_000076AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For Caesar! For a new dawn!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了凯撒！为了新的黎明！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_Attack_000076AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will feast on your flesh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要以你的肉为食！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_Attack_000076AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your bones will adorn my hall!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的骨头将被用来装饰我的大厅！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_Attack_000076B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The very sands will burn before I surrender to you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我向你屈服之前，就连沙子也会燃烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_Attack_00004B59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disgusting... to take from your betters!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶心......居然和你这种人打！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_Attack_00004B5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will know pain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将感受到痛苦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_Attack_00004B5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... will not...

ESP.TRADUIT: [咆哮]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Argh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊咯！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Steal
ESP.TRADUIT: 偷窃

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Put that back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！把那个放回去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Steal_000094F9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告你...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pickpocket
ESP.TRADUIT: 扒窃

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice try, dickhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想的美，蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Pickpocket_000094FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I can't see you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我看不见你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Pickpocket_000094FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... tried...

ESP.ORIGINAL: J-Janey...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_Death_000063B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't kill... what's already... dead...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法杀死......已经......死去的东西......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercy Guellan [0500BEFF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchMercyVT\SunC_Death_000094D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I... had it coming...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我......是罪有应得......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_Death_000094FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... don't understand...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_Death_0000952C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alea iacta est...
ESP.TRADUIT: 骰子已掷出......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck... you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_Death_00007019_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't... make it out of here...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_Death_0000702F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vengeance... justice...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_Death_00007045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How... how can you kill... a god...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_Death_000076B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For... Caesar...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_Death_00003287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much for radiation...
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射真是......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_Death_00003896_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least... I got laid...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_Death_000038BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I just wanted... to make it home...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_Death_00003ECE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time... out...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_Death_00003EE1_1.ogg
NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_Death_000044F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always knew this job... would be the death of me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早就知道这份工作…会要了我的命…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_Death_0000451C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did... my duty...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…尽到了职责…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_Death_00004B2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How... how is this possible...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这…这怎么可能…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_Death_00004B58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, howdy there, mister! Welcome to the Garden of Delights. It's awfully nice to see someone as fine as yourself stop by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哟，你好啊，先生！欢迎来到乐园。很高兴看到像您这样优秀的人光临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG_00002C5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heya, beautiful... welcome to the Garden of Delights. You got me tingling in all the right ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，美人儿…欢迎来到乐园。你让我心痒难耐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG_00002C5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, it's our little piece of Eden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是我们的小小乐园。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG2_00002C5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be shy now, me and the girls here can show you a good time. Whatever you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别害羞嘛，我和这儿的姑娘们能让你度过一段美好时光。无论你需要什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG2_00002C5D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would depend on the kind of good time you have to offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那得看你想要多美好的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can dream it up, we can do it... sometimes, even a little bit more. We even have special rooms fitted out for more... peculiar tastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你能想得到，我们就能办得到…有时候，甚至还能再多给你一些。我们甚至还有特别的房间，专为那些…独特的口味准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG3A_00002C5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just speak with one of the staff floating around and the Garden can see to whatever you need, friend. Whatever you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你直接找这儿转悠的服务生聊聊就行，乐园能满足你的任何需求，朋友。无论你需要什么。
