ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG3A_00002C5F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Who here would be the best person to ask about a key?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。那这里谁最适合问钥匙的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A key? Now, why would you ask about such a strange thing? They're a dime a dozen out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？你为啥要问这么奇怪的东西？这儿遍地都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG3B_00002C61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a long story, but I'm looking for a special key in particular.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说来话长，但我在找一把特别的钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know about any special key, friend... sorry that I can't be more help. The mistress might know, but... you didn't hear that from me, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道什么特别的钥匙，朋友…很抱歉帮不上你。女主人可能知道，但…你别说是我告诉你的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG4_00002C63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just take a load off and we can see to whatever desire you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先放松一下，我们会满足你的任何欲望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG4_00002C63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have a look around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我四处看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it. I'll be right here, sweet thing... don't keep a girl waiting, you hear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我就在这儿，宝贝…别让女孩等太久，听见没？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMayFG5_00002C65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] A spy? I can see why your superiors abandoned you out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]间谍？我总算明白为什么你的上司把你扔在这儿了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have not been abandoned at all, for it is the light of the Legion that guides my path. You, however, seek to aid the dying bear. Pitiful. Weak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我根本没有被抛弃，因为军团的光芒指引着我的道路。而你，却想要帮助那头垂死的熊。真是可悲。软弱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis1A_0000326A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Ave, brother. I come here seeking information.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你好，兄弟。我来这儿是想打听点消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed? Then you are fortunate, for that is what brought me to this place as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？那你很幸运，因为我也是为此而来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis1B_0000326C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar grows wary of any external threat that may come between our forces and victory at the Dam. I am but one of many emissaries he has dispatched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒对任何可能阻挡我们大军和大坝胜利的外部威胁都感到警惕。我只是他派出的众多特使之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis1B_0000326C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it you require?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis1B_0000326C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I'm just here to ask some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，我只是来问几个问题的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? And what makes you think I have anything to divulge? Least of all to a stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？那你凭什么认为我有东西可透露？更不用说透露给一个陌生人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis1C_0000326E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis1D_00003270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] So much bluster for little more than savage tribals. Where's all your sports equipment, fool?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]不过是些野蛮部落，你们就嚣张成这样。你的运动装备呢，蠢货？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You underestimate me, wretch... as you do our resolve. Fear not, for even if it isn't this day, your time will come to be hung from the cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你低估了我…也低估了我们的决心。等着吧，就算不是今天，你也会有被吊在十字架上的那一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2A1_00003272_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get out of my sight. Your presence alone disgusts me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在从我眼前消失。你的存在就让我恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2A1_00003272_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] While you were playing dress up, the Republic has been out here winning battles
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]当你在这儿过家家的时候，共和国在外面赢得了胜利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? Tell me, is that why your precious republic barely held the Dam? Why it has stretched itself to the point of breaking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？告诉我，是不是因为这个，你们那宝贵的共和国才勉强守住水坝？为什么它已经快要撑不住了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2A2_00003274_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You speak of victory, when your comrades are dying of thirst and fleeing en masse back to the Boneyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你谈论胜利，可你的同伴们正渴得要死，成群结队地逃回废土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2A2_00003274_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fear not: you will be broken on the cross before long. Just as all the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别怕：你很快就会像其他人一样被钉在十字架上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2A2_00003274_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Have you seen or heard anything about a key? A special key, perhaps kept under guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你有没有看到或听到过什么关于钥匙的消息？一把特别的钥匙，可能被守卫着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A key? Hmm... I have tried myself to gain access to the private suites, but the security here is vigilant. Surprisingly so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？嗯......我自己也试过要进入私人套房，但这儿的安保很警惕。出乎意料地警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2B_00003276_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't ask about what brought you here, but were I to guess, Lorandis will keep anything special on her person. The owner is elusive as ruthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会问你来这儿的原因，但如果要我猜的话，洛兰迪斯会把任何特别的东西都带在身上。这位老板既神秘又无情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2B_00003276_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a special key. Anything you know would be appreciated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一把特别的钥匙。你知道什么就告诉我吧，感激不尽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not make a habit of offering up information to any traveller that passes by... least of all when I sit, day after day, amidst filth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没有习惯向路过的旅人透露信息......更别提我坐在这里，日复一日，身处肮脏之中了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2C_00003278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wish to lose yourself in drink and flesh? Then do as you wish... if Lorandis does not submit, this Garden will burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想在酒色中迷失自己吗？那就随你便吧......如果洛兰迪斯不投降，这个乐园就会化为灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis2C_00003278_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Tell me about this Lorandis.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]跟我说说这个洛兰迪斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helen Lorandis, yes... another parasite that has grown fat on the corruption in these lands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海伦·洛兰迪斯，没错......又是一个靠这片土地上的腐败养肥的寄生虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis3_0000327A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even while bearing the Mark of the Legion, she has proven incredibly stubborn at my requests to form an alliance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管她身上带着军团的印记，但她对我的结盟请求却异常固执。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis3_0000327A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the plasma weapons supplied by the Van Graffs are but a taste of the influence her family wields, hence why the NCR cannot receive support.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道范·格拉夫提供的等离子武器只是她家族影响力的冰山一角，这就是NCR无法获得支持的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis3_0000327A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Do you believe she will acquiesce in time?
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你认为她最终会屈服吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truly? I cannot say... but Caesar does not tolerate failure. And neither shall I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？我不确定......但凯撒不容忍失败。我也不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis4_0000327C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you wish to do, you must not falter here. The degeneracy on display will soon be met by fire and sword.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你想做什么，你都不能在这里动摇。这里的堕落很快就会被火与剑终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Luthis [0500A6EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLuthisVT\SunA_SunALuthis4_0000327C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Information. The kind that's hard to come by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信息。那种难以得到的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the kind of thing on offer here, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里不提供那种东西，老兄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty1A_00003882_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to go chew someone's ear off, you pick up one of the girls. They'll listen to you blather on all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要想喋喋不休，你就去找那些姑娘吧。她们会听你整天胡扯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty1A_00003882_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see what you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't do tabs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里不赊账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty1B_00003884_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long as you pay for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你付钱就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty1B_00003885_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那会怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty1B_00003886_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty1C_00003888_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like an all right sort. I bet you hear all kinds of things over drinks out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来是个不错的人。我敢打赌，你在这里喝酒的时候听到了各种各样的消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you supposed to be some kind of spy? Legion, right? I'll tell ya the same thing I told that other fella, I'm here to serve drinks. Nothing else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该不会是某种间谍吧？军团，对吧？我要告诉你的，我已经告诉过那个家伙了，我是来端酒的。别的什么都不做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty2_0000388A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not with anyone. I'm just looking for a key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是任何人的手下。我只是在找一把钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To what? A chastity belt? Cause you're going about it the worst way possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找什么？贞操带吗？因为你用的方法最糟糕不过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty3_0000388C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. Have you seen anything like that round here? Anything at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。你在这儿见过类似的东西吗？任何东西都行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buddy, I've seen things here that'd make your stomach turn and your eyes pop outta your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老兄，我在这儿见过的东西会让你反胃，让你的眼珠子都瞪出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty4_0000388E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you know what? None of that I'm going to be repeating to you. So order a drink or get the hell out of here, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？我什么都不想再跟你说了。所以点杯酒或者滚出去，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty4_0000388E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suit yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. You'll have to excuse me if I don't get all weepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。如果我不哭鼻子，你得原谅我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunA_SunAMarty5_00003890_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think you're doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你在干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lighten up, dude! Ain't we all just here to have a good time?! I'm telling ya, that Betty is a saucy little minx...
ESP.TRADUIT: 放轻松点，老兄！我们不都是来寻开心的吗？！我告诉你，贝蒂可是个俏皮的小妞......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat1A_0000389B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd pay half a year's wages to give her another glazing, if you know what I'm saying! The redheads are always the best... or, uh... was she blonde?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意用半年的工资再给她上点妆，如果你懂我的意思！红发女郎总是最好的……呃……或者她是金发？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat1A_0000389B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. I'm okay... I'm okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。我没事......我没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat1A_0000389B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and you'll get a lot more than a kiss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以试试，但你会得到比吻更多的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon, baby! Don't be like that... I'll even let you sit in my lap. If you're good, I might even let you touch my Little Trat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来嘛，宝贝！别这样......我甚至可以让你坐在我腿上。如果你乖的话，我或许会让你摸摸我的小特拉特！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat1B_0000389D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can go all night, beautiful! You'll be screaming my name before long!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以整晚都这样做，美人！你很快就会呻吟我的名字了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat1B_0000389D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: H-hey! Where's everyone-- Urgh, now it's getting all blurry...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！大家在哪里——呃，现在一切都变得模糊了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat1C_0000389F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] You call yourself a soldier? Stand up straight and report!
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]你称自己为士兵？站直了报告！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y-yes, ma'am! Deeply sorry, ma'am... I-I allowed this place to get the better of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，长官！非常抱歉，长官......我......我被这个地方迷住了眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat2A_000038A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Corporal Trat of the 33rd Infantry Division. P-please... please go easy on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第33步兵师下士特拉特。请......请对我手下留情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat2A_000038A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y-yes, sir! Deeply sorry, sir... I-I allowed this place to get the better of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，长官！非常抱歉，长官......我......我被这个地方迷住了眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat2A_000038A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Corporal Trat of the 33rd Infantry Division. P-please... please go easy on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第33步兵师下士特拉特。请......请对我手下留情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat2A_000038A2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like you need to sit down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来需要坐下休息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: T-the only thing I need, my friend, is a whiskey in one hand and a bit of rump in the other!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一需要的，朋友，就是一手威士忌，一手翘臀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat2B_000038A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy there. You never know when some Legionnaires might sneak in and steal all the women away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点。你永远不知道什么时候军团士兵会偷偷溜进来把所有女人都抢走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: L-L-Legion? What? Where?! Shit, where's my rifle? Oh, don't tell me I left it back at base camp...
ESP.TRADUIT: 军......军团？什么？在哪里？！妈的，我的步枪呢？哦，别告诉我我把它忘在基地了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat2C_000038A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Perhaps you can tell me, corporal, what in god's name you're doing here when there's a war on?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]也许你能告诉我，下士，战争期间你他妈的在这里干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, uh, w-well... I was on shore leave, ma'am! Just completed my rotation at Forlorn Hope!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，呃，嗯......我在岸上休假，长官！刚在飘零希望营地换班交接！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat3A_000038A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, uh, w-well... I was on shore leave, sir! Just completed my rotation at Forlorn Hope!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，呃，嗯......我在岸上休假，长官！刚在飘零希望营地换班交接！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat3A_000038A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pssh... get out of my way, dickhead. If you ain't gonna point me to the nearest gal, then you can get the hell outta my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呸......让开，混蛋。如果你不打算指给我最近的姑娘，那你就给我滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat3B_000038AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Screw you, bitch. You ain't gonna be nice to me, then I ain't gonna be nice to you. I'm gonna find someone else to fuck
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你的，臭婊子。如果你不想对我好，那我也不会对你好。我要去找别人操
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat3B_000038AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, there's a whole war party heading right this way. I hear they have a taste for NCR flesh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，有一整队战士正朝这边来。我听说他们喜欢NCR的肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no, no, no, no, no... urgh, why does this always happen?! I swear, I'm never going on shore leave again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不......不，不，不，不，不......呃，为什么这种事总是发生？！我发誓，我再也不休假了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat3C_000038AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] And do you think your behaviour is fitting of a member of the armed forces, corporal? Do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]你认为你的行为符合武装力量的身份吗，下士？你怎么认为？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, uh... n-no.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat4A_000038B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Relax, kid. I was just messing with you. Enjoy your leave while you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]放松点，孩子。我只是在逗你。在你能休假的时候好好享受吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank god... you really had me sweating there! Fuck... it's like I was back at the academy again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢天谢地......你真的让我出了一身冷汗！妈的......就像我又回到了军校一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat4B_000038B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides... I think I need a drink of water. This headache, well... I don't think it's getting any better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且......我觉得我需要喝点水。头疼，嗯......我觉得它并没有好转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat4B_000038B2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Exactly. Now get yourself back to the nearest reporting officer. Your leave is over!
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]没错。现在回到你最近的报告官那里。你的假期结束了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awww, man... why does this always happen to me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，伙计......为什么这种事总是发生在我身上......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Corporal Trat [0500B2EA] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenTratVT\SunA_SunATrat5_000038B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know more about you first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想先多了解了解你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little old me? Why, I'm flattered... I like you. Tell you what, I'll even do it for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这个小人物？为什么，我很荣幸......我喜欢你。实话说吧，我甚至可以免费为你做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay1A_00003EB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little lost bird from a rancher's estate south of here. Look at me, though... I was never going to work the cornfields.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一只来自南部牧场庄园的迷路小鸟。不过看看我......我从来不会在玉米地里工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay1A_00003EB9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh... I'm not sure. What's your price?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，呃......我不太确定。你的价格是多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bit nervous? That's okay, take my hand... that's better, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点紧张？没关系，牵着我的手......好多了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay1B_00003EBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay. You're in paradise here and we're going to make you forget all your worries. All the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。这里是乐园，我们会让你忘记所有的烦恼。所有的痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay1B_00003EBB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little piece of Eden... and I can be your angel, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一小角乐园......我可以做你的天使，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay1B_00003EBB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cold feet? That's okay... I'll still be here for you, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胆怯了？没关系......我还是会在这里等你，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay1C_00003EBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't mind me asking, why do you--
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意我问的话，你为什么——

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do this line of work? Sell my body for caps? Sleep with strangers for a living? It's okay, I'm not offended... we get this all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做这一行？为了瓶盖出卖自己的身体？和陌生人睡觉谋生？没关系，我没有被冒犯......我们经常被问到这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay2A_00003EBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A gal's gotta make a living some way. It's not always that little slice of heaven, but it's close enough. We get treated well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女孩们总得想办法谋生。虽然它并不是天堂的一部分，但已经足够接近了。我们在这里被善待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay2A_00003EBF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And hey, maybe I can give a little something back to this world too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，嘿，也许我还可以为这个世界做点什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay2A_00003EBF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I don't...
Shhh... hush. Let me take over. Whatever you need, I'm here for you. I can make it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘......安静。让我来。无论你需要什么，我都在这里。我能帮你实现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay2B_00003EC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And getting closer to heaven, isn't that worth a few caps in the process?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且离天堂更近一步，不是吗？在这个过程中不值得花几个瓶盖吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay2B_00003EC1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [800 Caps] Stay with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [800瓶盖]和我在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Lay down on the bed for me. Let me take you to a place you won't ever forget...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]躺在床上。让我带你去一个你永远不会忘记的地方......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay3A_00003EC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You're a little light on caps, baby... but that's okay. Let's just sit here a while. I just like being close to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你身上的瓶盖有点少，宝贝......但没关系。我们就坐在这里一会儿吧。我只是喜欢和你在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay3A_00003EC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能。对不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhh... it's okay. It's okay. Just sit here with me a while and we can forget about the world...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘......没关系。没关系。就坐在我身边一会儿，我们可以忘记这个世界......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : May [0500A6ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMayVT\SunA_SunAMay3B_00003EC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you supposed to be working right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在应该在工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... can't you see I'm on a break? If I was working, I'd have my fist halfway up a Brahmin baron's ass by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不......你看不出来我在休息吗？如果我在工作，我现在的拳头已经在双头牛大亨的屁股里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn1A_00003ED1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a joke. Mostly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个玩笑。大部分是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn1A_00003ED1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm? Did you say something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？你说什么了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn1B_00003ED3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure have a mouth on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的很会说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's what all the clients tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，所有的客人都这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn2_00003ED5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're gonna talk my ear off, then it'll be double the usual fee. And I ain't putting out the smoke, just so we're clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你打算在我耳边唠叨，那就要付双倍的费用。而且我不会让你失望的，我们说清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn2_00003ED5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't happen to know anything about a key, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你碰巧知道什么关于钥匙的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Key? Oh, yeah... I know all about keys, chains, whips, gags... even got one of those sensory deprivation boxes if you're really freaky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？哦，是的......我对钥匙、锁链、鞭子、口球......都了如指掌......如果你真的很变态的话，我甚至还有一个感官剥夺箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn3_00003ED7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I didn't mean th--
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不是指那——

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. Sure you didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。当然你没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn4_00003ED9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you're in a whorehouse, if you didn't notice. The whole stammering awkward shtick got real old about two hundred years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你现在在妓院，如果你没注意到的话。这种结结巴巴、笨拙的伎俩在两百年前就已经过时了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn4_00003ED9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well... looks like my cig's almost burnt out. Guess it's back to work, then. So what'll it be? Food play? CBT? I can do all types.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗯......看来我的烟快烧完了。我想我该回去工作了。那么你想要什么？食物游戏？认知行为疗法？我什么都能做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn4_00003ED9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here for that. I'm looking for a key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来干那个的。我在找一把钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I get it. You must be from one of the cuckold chambers, right? Did your friends leave you hanging with the chastity belt on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了。你一定是从某个戴贞操带的房间里来的吧？你的朋友是不是把你丢在那里了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn5_00003EDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, that must really suck... pity we don't have a master key for those anymore. You could always try getting it off with explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，那可真糟糕......可惜我们现在没有那些万能钥匙了。你可以尝试用炸药把它炸开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn5_00003EDB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the boss doesn't pay me to stand around and chat with people. It's back to work for me. The Mojave could give even Reno a run for its money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，老板可没付钱让我站在这里和人闲聊。我得回去工作了。莫哈维的财富连里诺都甘拜下风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dawn [0500B2EC] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenDawnVT\SunA_SunADawn5_00003EDB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, uh... wanted to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，呃......想问你一件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the questions? I think I know what you're looking for... and, baby, you've come to the right place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要问问题？我想我知道你在找什么......而且，宝贝，你来对地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel1A_000044E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nervous, are we? It's okay... I'll be right here when you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很紧张吗？没关系......等你改变主意的时候，我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel1B_000044E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got the wrong idea. I'm trying to find a key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你误会了。我在找一把钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I hold all the keys... why, I'm a bonafide heartbreaker. But you already knew that, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我掌握着所有的钥匙......我是个如假包换的心碎者。但你已经知道了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel2A_000044E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, what's a little risk of falling in love to make the experience all the more worthwhile? That is what I can offer you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，爱上一个人的风险又算得了什么？为了让这次体验更加值得，我可以给你提供这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel2A_000044E4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what precisely would I be looking for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我到底在找什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, now... don't be coy. You're looking for a little aphrodisiac... a way to escape this cruel, harsh world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松......别害羞了。你在找一点春药......一种逃离这个残酷、严酷世界的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel2B_000044E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luckily for you, I can give you exactly that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，我可以给你想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel2B_000044E6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not speaking figuratively here. I'm here for an actual key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在打比方。我在找一把真正的钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tough luck on that then, friend. Marty here can tell you the same damn thing, this ain't the kind of place to kiss and tell...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你可真不走运，朋友。这里的马蒂也会告诉你同样该死的事，这可不是个能随便谈情说爱的地方......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel3A1_000044E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You start feeling all giddy inside, you come find me. Gabriel doesn't judge... I can give you the escape you so desperately crave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你开始感到兴奋，就来找我。加百列不会评判你......我能给你渴望已久的解脱
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel3A1_000044E8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you say that to all your clients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌你对所有客户都这么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only because it's what you deserve, beautiful... my services don't come cheap, but I assure you... it's worth every cap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只因为那是你应得的，美人......我的服务不便宜，但我向你保证......它值得每一枚瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel3A2_000044EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my. I... I'm suddenly feeling flustered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我的天。我......我突然感到心慌意乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay... take my hand. Let Gabriel sort you out. With me, you'll get a little closer to heaven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系......牵着我的手。让加百列帮你解决问题。和我在一起，你会离天堂更近一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel3B1_000044EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even just for a moment, let those worries melt away. Let me be your guide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪怕只是一瞬间，让那些烦恼消失吧。让我做你的向导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel3B1_000044EC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是这次。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suit yourself, hot stuff... but you know where I'll be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你的便，火辣小妞......你知道我会在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel3B2_000044EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [700 Caps] After you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [700瓶盖]你先请。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] My, my... so polite. Why, I could just eat you up... Mmm...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，哎呀......真是有礼貌。我简直想把你一口吞下......嗯......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel4_000044F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come, let me sort you out. I will show you a time you won't ever forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，让我来帮你解决问题。我会让你度过一段永生难忘的时光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500B2ED] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenGabrielVT\SunA_SunAGabriel4_000044F0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You looking for a good time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想找乐子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auntie Agnes [0500B2EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\FemaleOld01\SunA_SunAWW1_000044FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must have mistaken me for someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定把我当成别人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I don't know about that. Let me have a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我可不这么认为。让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auntie Agnes [0500B2EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\FemaleOld01\SunA_SunAWW2_00004500_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now wait just a second--
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，就一会儿——

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's nothing to be ashamed of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没什么可羞耻的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auntie Agnes [0500B2EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\FemaleOld01\SunA_SunAWW3_00004502_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can't keep that thing under control, I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不能控制好那东西，就让我来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auntie Agnes [0500B2EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\FemaleOld01\SunA_SunAWW3_00004502_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't happening, I won't allow--
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会发生，我不会允许的——

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can take care of that problem for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你解决这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auntie Agnes [0500B2EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\FemaleOld01\SunA_SunAWW4_00004504_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took your sweet time getting here, didn't you? Things're finally looking up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你花了很长时间才到这里，对吧？事情终于有了转机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auntie Agnes [0500B2EE] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\FemaleOld01\SunA_SunAWW4_00004504_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for the owner of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找这个地方的主人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? And I'm looking for a pay rise, but that's just about as likely to happen. So what's your excuse? Lorandis doesn't do services. For anybody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？而我在等涨工资，但那几乎不可能发生。那你的借口是什么？洛兰迪斯不提供服务。给任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett1A_0000450B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna keep trying your luck, the only thing you'll get is a bullet to the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想碰碰运气，那你能得到的只有一颗子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett1A_0000450B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett1B_0000450D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wouldn't be the first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这已经不是第一次了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh huh. Next you'll be telling me those Boomer lunatics will get a crashed plane to fly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。接下来你就会告诉我那些疯子大炮族会让一架坠毁的飞机飞起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett2A_0000450F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to see her. It's urgent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要见她。紧急情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's urgent, then you're really talking to the wrong guy. Go find one of the girls floating about, they can see to whatever sick fantasy you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是紧急情况，那你真的找错人了。去找一个在附近游荡的女孩吧，她们可以满足你的任何病态幻想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett2B_00004511_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you haven't noticed, they don't pay me to stand around and appreciate the scenery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你没注意到，他们可不会付钱让我站在这里欣赏风景。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett2B_00004511_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not trying to cause trouble. I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想惹麻烦。我发誓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, really? Well, shit... go right in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真的吗？妈的......直接进去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett3_00004513_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only everyone in this goddamn wasteland could wander in and talk with one of the most powerful families in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这个该死的废土里的每个人都能进来和莫哈维最强大的家族之一交谈就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett3_00004513_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what are you looking for? A hug?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你在找什么？一个拥抱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett3_00004513_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to speak with your boss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要和你的老板谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good god, man... you're like a broken record, aren't you? You want to get blasted for disturbing her, be my guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，伙计......你真是喋喋不休，不是吗？如果你不想被轰出去，就请便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett4_00004515_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to run it by the captain if you want to get inside. I doubt you have the caps, or the contacts, to afford one of the real suites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想进去，就得先过上尉那一关。我怀疑你既没有瓶盖，也没有人脉，去住真正的套房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett4_00004515_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're someone else's problem now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是别人的问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brett [0500B2EF] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenBrettVT\SunA_SunABrett4_00004515_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for the owner of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找这个地方的主人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That could be arranged. The question is, what is Ms. Lorandis to you? You have been making quite the nuisance of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那倒是可以安排。问题是，洛兰迪斯女士对你来说是什么人？你可真是给自己找了不少麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes1_00004B17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could use a lesson or two in subtlety, but your request is not impossible. Not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以学学怎么更委婉一点，但你的要求也不是不可能。还没到时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes1_00004B17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] I come on behalf of the Republic. We need to discuss an urgent alliance.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]我代表共和国而来。我们需要讨论紧急联盟的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: An alliance? Hmm... these things are not for me to decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 联盟？嗯......这事不是我能决定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2A_00004B19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm certainly curious why the Republic, especially now of all times, would choose to reach out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然很好奇共和国，尤其是现在这个时候，为什么会选择伸出援手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2A_00004B19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevertheless, that is not my place to say. Your activities are not... entirely unknown to us. An alliance could prove useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，那不是我该说的。你的活动我们……并非一无所知。结成联盟或许会有所帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2A_00004B19_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Caesar calls upon everyone to fall under his banners. The Garden is no exception.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]凯撒呼吁所有人在他的旗帜下团结起来。乐园也不例外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are not the first, nor will you be the last. Regardless, I will give the same answer as I did your little compatriot downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是第一个，也不会是最后一个。不过，我会给你和楼下那个小同胞一样的回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2B_00004B1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar may linger around the Garden for as long as he wants... the Lorandis family will not involve itself in tribal squabbling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒想在乐园待多久就待多久......洛兰迪斯家族不会插手部落间的争斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2B_00004B1B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must understand, she has a business to maintain and associating with... particular people is less than desirable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须明白，她有生意要打理，和......某些人扯上关系可不是什么好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2B_00004B1B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can send whatever spies you want, attempt sabotage, but her answer will remain the same. Now, I must ask you to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以派多少间谍就派多少，尝试搞破坏，但她的答案永远不会变。现在，我得请你离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2B_00004B1B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I represent one of the water barons. We're looking to establish key trading partners in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表水贩之一。我们正在寻找莫哈维的关键贸易伙伴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hmph. And what family would that be, I wonder... nevertheless, the water situation has been growing rather dire.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]嗯。我很好奇你是哪个家族的......不过，水的问题确实越来越严重了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2C_00004B1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is not my place to say, but I can't refuse a lucrative prospect either. Go. Brett will unlock the door for you below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无权决定，但我也不能拒绝一个有利可图的前景。走吧。布雷特会在下面为你开门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2C_00004B1D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You seem to think that I'm here to amuse you. That I can be taken for a fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你似乎认为我是来逗你开心的。认为我可以被当作傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2C_00004B1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guards, remove this pest from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警卫，把这个害虫赶出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2C_00004B1E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would it help if I said please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我说“请”会有帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that all you have to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就只有这些要说的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2D_00004B20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I can put a bullet in her head, obviously... but I think I'll start with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然我可以往她头上开一枪......但我想我会先从你开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're more than welcome to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大可试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes2E_00004B22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你抽出宝贵的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt. Make sure you keep your hands away from the other suites. One of the guards can escort you to Helen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。确保你的手不要碰到其他套房。警卫可以带你去见海伦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes3A_00004B24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] I don't think you quite understand the gravity of the situation here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]我想你还没有完全理解这里的严峻形势。

ESP.ORIGINAL: More empty threats. This is the same tactic your 'Luthis' plant tried, and it had the same effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是空口威胁。这是你们‘卢西斯’用过的老一套了，效果还是一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes3B1_00004B26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guards, remove them from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警卫，把他们赶出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes3B1_00004B26_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Caesar will not extend this offer twice. You would be a fool to turn it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]凯撒不会第二次提出这个提议。你拒绝它就是愚蠢之举。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And surely you are aware that you would be a fool to try anything within the Garden's boundaries or the Lorandis dynasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你当然也知道，在乐园的边界或洛兰迪斯王朝的范围内尝试任何事情都是愚蠢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes3B2_00004B28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can show yourself out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以自行离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes3B2_00004B28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tough crowd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难以对付

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can show yourself out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以自行离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Captain Reynes [0500B2F0] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenReynesVT\SunA_SunAReynes3C_00004B2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A stranger. Intriguing. I trust Reynes made it at least somewhat of an obstacle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个陌生人。有趣。我相信雷恩斯至少给你制造了一些障碍吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen1_00004B36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe you have something I'm looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你有我要找的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you mean a slow death and a shallow grave, then you've come to the right place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是指慢慢死去和浅浅的坟墓，那你来对地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen2_00004B38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether you're some wretched little shit that has wandered in where you shouldn't or a killer vying for my life, you've made a serious mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你是不小心闯进来的可怜虫，还是来杀我的杀手，你都犯了一个严重的错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen2_00004B38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One, I'm afraid, that you won't live to repeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这个错误，你没机会再犯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen2_00004B38_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to make this difficult. Hand over the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不必把这件事搞得这么难。交出钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Key? Ah, I see... so the secret's finally up. Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？啊，我明白了......所以秘密终于揭晓了。有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen3A_00004B3A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wretched? Now you're just being cruel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜？现在你只是残忍了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cruel? No... you have no idea what true cruelty is. If you surrender now, perhaps we can make it a quick death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 残忍？不......你根本不知道什么是真正的残忍。如果你现在投降，也许我们可以让你死得快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen3B_00004B3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say perhaps, but we'll leave it up to chance. Not one of my girls has successfully escaped. How will you compare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，但我们会把一切交给命运。我的女孩们没有一个能成功逃脱。你会怎么样呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen3B_00004B3C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still believe you hold all the cards? All it takes is a bullet to change everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还认为你掌握着所有的牌吗？只要一颗子弹就能改变一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That it does... but you don't believe you can make it out of here alive, surely?
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确......但你肯定不相信你能活着离开这里吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen3C_00004B3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dear, you're standing in the most heavily guarded place in the Mojave. Even Hoover Dam itself won't be held as long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，你正站在莫哈维保卫最严的地方。就连胡佛水坝本身也坚持不了这么久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen3C_00004B3E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you do know where it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你确实知道它在哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all this time, someone has finally come looking. To think entire generations have passed without so much as a peep...
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了这么久，终于有人来找了。想想整整几代人都没有半点消息......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4A_00004B46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A pity you won't ever see what's behind it. As it has been passed from each family member to the next, the rule has remained the same: it is mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾，你永远也看不到它背后的东西。因为它从每个家族成员传给下一代，规则始终如一：它是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4A_00004B46_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can save the speech, lady. I'm just here for the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士，你可以省省你的演讲了。我只是来拿钥匙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever key brought you here, it is not something I will ever allow you to take. That is simply the way of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你用什么钥匙来到这里，我都不会让你把它带走。事情就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4B1_00004B48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Know. Your. Place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 认清你的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4B1_00004B48_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep yammering on like this and I might as well do the Mojave a favour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续这样唠叨下去，我还不如给莫哈维帮个忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have not lived this long without making enemies, and yet I have lived precisely this long by learning how to deal with them. Promptly. Swiftly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我活了这么久不是没有树敌，我正是因为学会了如何迅速、果断地对付他们，才活到了今天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4B2_00004B4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you would attack me here, then go ahead. I will see that your demise is long and painful, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想在这里攻击我，那就来吧。我会让你的死变得漫长而痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4B2_00004B4A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this bluster for such a frail body. What would you know of pain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么虚张声势，就你这脆弱的身体。你知道什么是痛苦吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can stand here and exchange more empty threats until my private guard arrives, or you could simply submit now and save me the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以站在这里继续交换这些空洞的威胁，直到我的私人警卫到来，或者你现在就屈服，省得我麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4C_00004B4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am rather busy... and I have wasted enough time on you already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很忙......而且我已经在你身上浪费太多时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen4C_00004B4C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be stupid. You don't even need what it unlocks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻了。你甚至不需要它能解锁的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you as stupid as you look? It's not a question of need, it is about what is mine. This place's mine. Everyone and everything you see here's mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和看起来一样蠢吗？这不是需不需要的问题，而是属于谁的问题。这个地方是我的。你看到的这里的每一个人和每一样东西都是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen5A1_00004B4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't let you take even a grain of sand. The Garden was built by me and it answers to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会让你带走哪怕一粒沙子。乐园是我建的，它只听我的法令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen5A1_00004B4E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can do this one of two ways. It's your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以有两种方式来做这件事。取决于你选什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there is nothing left to say. Guards, if you would dispose of this nuisance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就没什么好说的了。警卫，你们处理掉这个麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen5A2_00004B50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Then you can suffer the consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。那你就得承担后果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there is nothing left to say. Guards, if you would dispose of this nuisance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就没什么好说的了。警卫，你们处理掉这个麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen5B_00004B52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look into my eyes and tell me you have the strength you claim. You're pathetic... now hand it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着我的眼睛，告诉我你真的有你说的那么强大。你真可怜......现在交出来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I don't...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen6A_00004B54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it. Just... take it and go. Go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿去吧。拿着它走。走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen6A_00004B54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you won't hand it over, then I'll have to take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不交出来，那我就亲自动手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're more than welcome to try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大可试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAHelen6B_00004B56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can stare at it all day, it's not going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以整天盯着它看，它又不会跑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm? Oh, uh... sorry, I'll get out of your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，呃......对不起，我会给你让路的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro1_00005D63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to swim here, you're welcome to. You don't need to worry about Mirelurks, at least...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想在这里游泳，欢迎之至。你至少不用担心泥沼蟹......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro1_00005D63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... leave me be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是......别管我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro1_00005D65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I-it's nothing, really... I don't know what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真-真的没什么......我不知道你在说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro2_00005D67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I asked, didn't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我问了，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not with Helen, are you? No... you couldn't be. Okay, okay... I have to take the chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是和海伦一起的，对吧？不……你不可能是。好吧，好吧……我必须冒这个险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro3_00005D69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't know what brings you here, friend, but the Garden of Delights ain't all it's cracked up to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不知道是什么把你带到这里来的，朋友，但极乐花园并不是并不是它吹嘘的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro3_00005D69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... it's all an act. They put on airs, they pretend it's a slice of paradise, but it's built on the blood and sweat of others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方……全都是装出来的。他们装腔作势，假装这是天堂的一角，但它是建立在别人的血汗之上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro3_00005D69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that includes someone you care about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中也包括你在乎的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro4_00005D6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Janey... she's all I've had since we first met a few weeks back. This must sound crazy, but... I can't stop thinking about her. She's my world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 珍妮......自从我们几周前第一次见面以来，她就一直在我身边。这听起来一定很疯狂，但是......我无法停止想她。她是我的全世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro4_00005D6B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. She's one of the girls here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。她是这里的女孩之一。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Or, uh... s-she was. It's my fault, I convinced her to run away with me, to try and get as far as we could from Reynes and Helen and everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。或者，呃......她曾经是。这是我的错，我说服她和我一起逃跑，试着尽可能远离雷恩斯、海伦和所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro5_00005D6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we didn't make it out in time. I haven't seen her since she got caught.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们没有及时逃出去。自从她被抓住后，我就再也没有见过她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro5_00005D6D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If she was captured, how did you manage to get away? They wouldn't let you just wander around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果她真的被俘了，那你又是怎么逃脱的？他们可不会让你随便闲逛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who says I did... now I'll always have the marks to prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁说我……现在我的身上可是永远都留着这些伤痕，作为证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro6_00005D6F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea where she is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道她在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the hardest part... see that house just up the hill? That's where Lorandis and her goons take people to be... disciplined.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最难的部分......看到山上那栋房子了吗？那是洛兰迪斯和她的爪牙们把人带去......受训的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro6_00005D71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If... no, Jane will be there. I know she must be. She will be alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果......不，珍妮会在那里。我知道她一定在那里。她还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro6_00005D71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So? What's stopping you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么？是什么阻止了你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't no hero, friend. God, I can barely hold a gun up straight... what's a fella like me gonna do against plasma rifles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是什么英雄，朋友。天哪，我连枪都拿不稳......像我这样的人怎么能对付等离子步枪呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro7_00005D73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel useless... all I can do is stand here while Janey suffers god knows what... I wish I never came into her life. This is all my fault!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得自己一无是处......我所能做的就是站在这里，而珍妮却在受苦受难......我真希望我从来没有走进她的生活。这都是我的错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro7_00005D73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your voice down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小声点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: S-sorry. I just wish there was something I could do. She doesn't deserve this... Janey's too good for this place. Far too good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对-对不起。我只是希望我能做些什么。她不该受这样的苦......珍妮不属于这个地方。她太善良了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro8_00005D75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: R-really? Oh god, thank you! Thank you so much! Look, I've never been inside the house myself, but I know someone here will have the key for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真-真的吗？哦，天哪，谢谢你！太感谢你了！听着，我自己从没进过那栋房子，但我知道这里有人会有它的钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you have to get her out of there. Forget me, forget whatever this place offers, Janey's all that matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你一定要把她从那里救出来。忘了我，忘了这个地方的一切，珍妮才是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D77_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would do anything for her, even gladly give my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意为她做任何事情，甚至愿意献出我的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D77_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can get her out of there, but it's going to cost you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能把她救出来，但这得花你不少钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want caps, that's not a problem... all I care about is Janey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要瓶盖？那没问题……我只关心珍妮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you have to get her out of there. I can only imagine what they're doing to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托了，你一定要把她救出来。我无法想象他们会对她做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you everything I have. She's the only thing that matters to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意给你我所有的东西。她是我唯一在乎的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D79_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, good luck with that. Maybe there'll be something left to bury.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，祝你好运吧。也许还能剩下点什么可以埋葬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?! No... no! Don't say that! I-it can't be too late! It can't!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！不……不！别这么说！我-现在还来得及！一定还来得及！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro9_00005D7B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会想想办法的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I mean it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。我是说真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliIntro1_00005D7D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still working on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在努力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, do what you can. We're her only hope!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托了，尽你所能。我们是她唯一的希望！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliCheck_00005D86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about that house over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于那边那栋房子的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't wanna go in there. Trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会想进去的。相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscMarty1_00005D88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you've just got me curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是让我更好奇了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever heard the expression about the cat? If you're smart, you'll leave that well alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过关于猫的谚语吗？如果你聪明的话，最好离它远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscMarty2_00005D8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last person to fuck around didn't end up looking too good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上一个胡来的人可没落得什么好下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscMarty2_00005D8A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it, like some kink chamber? Special clients only?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么地方？像是某种变态的密室吗？只接待特殊客户？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The kind of place where you don't ask questions, got it? Now leave it be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是那种你不该问问题的地方，明白了吗？现在就别管了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marty [0500B2EB] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenMartyVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscMarty3_00005D8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck are you doing? Weapons must remain holstered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的在干什么？武器必须收起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Guard [06006385] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\MaleAdult05\SunAMisc_SunAMiscGuard1_0000638A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was planning to break one of the girls out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他打算把其中一个女孩从这里救出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well, don't say you weren't warned. Just get the fuck away from here already.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，别说你没被警告过。现在快从这里滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Guard [06006385] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\MaleAdult05\SunAMisc_SunAMiscGuard2A_0000638C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我不这么认为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Guard [06006385] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\MaleAdult05\SunAMisc_SunAMiscGuard2A_0000638F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别挡我的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该去死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Guard [06006385] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\MaleAdult05\SunAMisc_SunAMiscGuard2B_0000638E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have information to exchange.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有信息要交换。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? Now you really do have my attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？现在你确实引起了我的注意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen1_00006393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me, what could possibly be worth the item you're seeking, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我，你寻求的那件物品，到底有什么价值呢，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen1_00006393_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about the life of one of your girls? I can even give you the person planning to do it. And how.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手下其中一个女孩的性命如何？我甚至可以告诉你打算这么做的人是谁，以及方法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... it is true that flesh is worth as much as gold here. Very well... I'm willing to hear your proposition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...确实，在这里，肉体的价值堪比黄金。好吧...我愿意听听你的提议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen2_00006395_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hand over that key and the two of them are yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交出那把钥匙，他们两个就归你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Very well... take it. Now, the information.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]很好......拿去吧。现在，告诉我信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen3_00006397_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Did you seriously believe you could bargain here? It's quite obvious you're referring to Eli... my men have been watching him like a hawk.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你真的以为能在这里讨价还价吗？很明显，你指的是伊莱......我的人一直在像鹰一样盯着他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen3_00006398_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your information is worthless to me... as are you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的信息对我来说一文不值......你也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen3_00006398_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eli is planning to rescue the woman from the house outside. He's waiting by the dock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莱打算从屋外救出那个女人。他正在码头等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently it was not enough for him to return here, dare to even show his face... now he thinks to steal my property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，他回来还不够，竟然还敢露面...现在他还想偷走我的财产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen4A_0000639A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will send someone to deal with him shortly. His gelding apparently wasn't enough to see the error of his ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很快就会派人去处理他。显然，他被阉了也没让他意识到错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen4A_0000639A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have my thanks, but, more importantly, the key. Now, if you would leave promptly... there is much to attend to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢了，但更重要的是，那把钥匙。现在，如果你马上离开的话.....还有很多事情要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen4A_0000639A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I changed my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改主意了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will not stand being double-crossed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会容忍被背叛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Helen Lorandis [0500B2F4] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF1]SunA) Touch of Paradise EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenHelenVT\SunA_SunAMiscHelen4B_0000639C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the key to the house. Get ready to move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有那所房子的钥匙。准备行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you... that's the best news I've heard in days. I'll do whatever it takes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你......这是我几天来听到的最好的消息。我会不惜一切代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliGo1_0000639E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay here. Who knows what'll be waiting inside there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在这里。谁知道里面会有什么等着我们。
