ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I'm not a fighter, but I'll wait for your signal. We're coming, Janey... hold on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我不是个战士，但我会等你的信号。我们来了，珍妮......坚持住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliGo2_000063A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got another one coming in? Front cell is occupied, you'll have to take 'em round-- Hold on, what do you think you're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又有人来了吗？前面的牢房已经满了，你得带他们绕过去——等一下，你以为你在这里干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena1_000063A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I intruding? Dreadfully sorry, the door was unlocked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打扰到你们了吗？非常抱歉，门没有锁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many times have I told... never mind that. This area is off-limits to patrons. I must kindly ask you to leave. Immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过多少次了......算了。这个区域对顾客是禁止入内的。我必须客气地请你离开。马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena2A_000063A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean? I'm one of the new guards here. Reynes must've forgotten to notify you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思？我是这里的新警卫之一。雷恩斯一定忘了通知你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guard, huh? You don't look familiar to me, but hey... I'm just one of the pencil-pushers. Lorandis can shove it up her ass for all I care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警卫，是吗？我看着你不怎么眼熟，但嘿……我只不过是个小职员罢了。洛兰迪斯怎么样我无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena2B_000063A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have someone coming in? I need to mark off the ledger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有谁来吗？我需要记账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena2B_000063A6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't happen to have seen my, uh... pet dog, would you? Chauncey does so love to run off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到我的......呃......宠物狗了吗？昌西特别喜欢乱跑！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pet dog? Look, you need to leave. I'm sure one of our kindly staff will be able to attend to your needs outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宠物狗？听着，你需要离开。我们的工作人员会在外面满足你的需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena3A_000063A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to ask you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会再说第二遍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena3A_000063A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, yeah... sure. Let me just get out their name. So many faces to remember, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，是的......当然。让我查一下他们的名字。你知道，要记住这么多面孔可真不容易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena3B_000063AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, there must have been some kind of misunderstanding... I'm simply trying to--
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，一定有什么误会......我只是在尝试——

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guards! We have an intruder!
ESP.TRADUIT: 警卫！我们有入侵者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena4_000063AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, the alarm isn't working! Now you've done it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，警报没响！现在好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lena [0500B2F6] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenLenaVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscLena4_000063AC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: W-who... who is that? Please... I can't take anymore...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscJaneRescu_000063B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all right. I'm here to help. You must be Janey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事的。我来帮你。你一定是珍妮吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? D-did Eli send you? I... I thought the mistress must've got to him already...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？伊莱派你来的吗？我......我以为女主人已经抓住他了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscJaneRescu_000063B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god... this hurts like hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪......这太疼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscJaneRescu_000063B5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you walk? We need to get you out of here before someone comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能走吗？我们得在你被人发现之前离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I need a moment...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我......我需要休息一下......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscJaneRescu_000063B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, someone's coming! Help me... I'm in no shape for anything, let alone a fight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，有人来了！帮我......我现在的状况什么都做不了，更不用说打架了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscJaneRescu_000063B7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's alive! Oh, thank god... thank you! You have no idea how good it is to see her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她还活着！哦，感谢上帝......谢谢你！你不知道看到她有多好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliRescue_000069B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's having trouble walking, but we have to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她走路有困难，但我们必须离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I know... look, I managed to tail one of the guards into the main estate and steal some of their uniforms. I think that's our only hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，我知道......听着，我设法跟踪了一个警卫进入主庄园，并偷了一些他们的制服。我认为这是我们唯一的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliRescue_000069B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will have to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只能这样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, Janey... but we have to move you. Here, I'll help as best I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，珍妮......但我们必须带你离开这里。来，我会尽我所能帮助你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliRescue_000069B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eli... I-I thought you didn't make it out...
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莱......我-我以为你没能逃出来......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ1_000069BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I almost didn't... but, God willing, I made it back to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点就没能......但是，上帝保佑，我回到了你身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ2_000069BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea what they put me through... I-I heard the stories, but I was so close to breaking...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法想象他们对我做了什么......我-我听过那些故事，但我快要崩溃了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ3_000069BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay, my starlight. I would've crawled through Hell itself if it meant you were safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事的，我的星光。为了你的安全，我原意爬过地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ4_000069C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we have to get you out of here. I'm sorry to move you so soon, but I'll help you into the armour, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们必须带你离开这里。很抱歉这么快就移动你，但我会帮你穿上护甲，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ5_000069C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: O-okay. I trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好-好的。我相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ6_000069C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I won't ever let you down. Ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也永远不会让你失望。永远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEJ7_000069C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready? We need to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗？我们需要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way. The two of us would probably draw attention if we have any weapons, so I'll leave this to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带路。如果我们带着武器，我们两个可能会引人注意，所以把这个交给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliOut1_000069CC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come, Janey... let's get as far away from this place as we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，珍妮......我们离这个地方越远越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eli [0500B2F2] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenEliVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEliOut1_000069CC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't going to leave you two behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会把你们两个留在这里的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your humility shames me. I wish you had come into our lives long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的谦逊让我惭愧。真希望我们早点遇到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape1_000069DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, these are all the caps we could carry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这是我们所有的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape1_000069DC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep it. You need it more than me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着吧。你比我更需要它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again, you save us. God really did shine down upon me to bring you into our lives. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你又一次救了我们。上帝真的眷顾我，让你进入我们的生活。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape2A_000069DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
No, thank you... with your help, the two of us can really make something for ourselves out here now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢你......有了你的帮助，我们两个现在可以在这里有所作为了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape2B_000069E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你接下来打算怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can't linger, that's for certain. It's all been such a rush, these past few days... but Eli's a good soul. I can see that in him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能耽搁了，这是肯定的。过去的这几天真是匆匆忙忙的.....伊莱是个好人。我我能看得出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape3_000069E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we'll head north. Or west. I hear the Appalachians are nice this time of year. The important thing is, we'll be together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们会往北走。或者往西。我听说阿巴拉契亚山脉每年这个时候都很美。重要的是，我们会在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape3_000069E2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you believe in such things, friend, but... may the light of the Lord go with you. Your kindness is too good for this world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是否相信这些事情，朋友，但……愿主的光照耀着你。你的善良对这个世界来说太美好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jane [0500B2F1] (mod) Quest : ([06005768]SunAMisc) Bird Or The Cage EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunGardenJaneVT\SunAMisc_SunAMiscEscape3_000069E2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Ave, brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]再见，兄弟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you. Tell me, what brings you here? Does Caesar require more slaves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有。告诉我，是什么把你带到这里来的？凯撒需要更多的奴隶吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1A_00006FE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our fires will soon sweep this land and it will be beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的火焰很快就会席卷这片土地，它将会变得美丽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1A_00006FE3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Shouldn't you guys be busy mounting each other?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]你们不是应该忙着互相攻击吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that supposed to offend me? I'd rape your fucking corpse, if it pleased me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想冒犯我吗？如果我高兴，我会强奸你的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1B1_00006FE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are nothing. Everything you represent is nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都不是。你所代表的一切什么都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1B1_00006FE5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Maximus, huh? Thanks for letting me know who to look for.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]马克西姆斯，是吗？谢谢你让我知道要找谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assuming you make it any further.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前提是你能走得更远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1B2_00006FE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider me a person of interest. One you would do well to not cross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我当作一个可疑人物。一个你最好不要得罪的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then... consider me interested. We don't often get another interested party rolling through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么......我感兴趣了。我们不常有可疑的人来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1C_00006FE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what'll it be? Are you here to give or take your pound of flesh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你想要什么？你是来给予还是索取你的那一份？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph1C_00006FE9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] As strange as this may sound... I'm looking for a particular key.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]虽然这听起来很奇怪......我在找一把特别的钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A key? Is this a mission on behalf of Caesar? You're right on that account... it's certainly a strange request.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一把钥匙？这是代表凯撒的任务吗？你说得对......这确实是一个奇怪的要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph2A_00006FEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Enough of the talking. Shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]说得够多了。是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't agree more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph2B_00006FED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh... I'm still new to this...
Here to pop your cherry, huh? You sure picked an interesting time to get into the business, kid... but I reckon we can sort you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来这里破你的处，是吗？你挑了个有趣的时间入行，孩子......但我想我们可以帮你解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph2C_00006FEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] This is by Caesar's will, brother. I must hasten back to the Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]这是凯撒的意愿，兄弟。我必须赶快回到堡垒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmph. Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3A_00006FF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know nothing about any key round these parts, but you'd best talk with the boss downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这附近有什么钥匙，但你最好和楼下的老板谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3A_00006FF1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion does well, very well, from this arrangement. Don't fuck it up for some key, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团通过这一安排过得很好，非常好，别因为一个钥匙就把事情搞砸了，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3A_00006FF1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on ahead. I'll call the others to let them know you're coming through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先走吧。我会叫其他人让他们知道你来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3A_00006FF1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, uh... people do you have on offer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃......你提供的是什么样的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: People, huh? You really are green around the ears...
ESP.TRADUIT: 人，是吗？你真的是个新手......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3B_00006FF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends what you're looking for, kid. We got strong ones for labour work, women for breeding, weaklings for some real fun, whatever takes your fancy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于你在找什么，孩子。我们有强壮的劳动力，有生育能力的女人，有弱者供人取乐，随你挑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3B_00006FF3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the great thing about this land. People can disappear and no one bats an eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这片土地的美妙之处就在于，人可以消失，而无人过问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph3B_00006FF3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Who must I speak with to organise payment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。我应该和谁谈付款的事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to run it by Duport. You just missed him, but he's probably heading downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得去找杜波特。你刚错过他，他可能正下楼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph4_00006FF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, then. I'll let them know you're coming through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就走吧。我会通知他们你要来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frumentarii Orphellum [0500B305] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodOrphellumVT\SunB_SunBOrph4_00006FF5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck me... I can hardly get a wink with all that screaming going on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的......这么多尖叫声，我简直睡不着......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing1_00007002_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you wouldn't mind, I'm trying to pass...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意的话，我正要过去......

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm? Who the fuck are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？你他妈的是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing2_00007007_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I checked, we didn't need any errand boys running about. Or are you another straggler from Caesar's lot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后确认一下，我们这儿不需要什么跑腿的小弟。还是说，你是凯撒那帮人里的又一个掉队者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing2_00007007_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Show some respect. I am here at the request of Caesar himself!
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]尊重点。我是受凯撒本人的委托而来的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Respect? Just who do you--
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊重？你他妈的——
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3A1_00007009_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit. You're the one Orphellum called through about, huh? Ah, look... I didn't mean nothing by it, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，妈的。你就是奥菲莉亚提到的那个人，是吗？啊，你看......我不是故意的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3A1_00007009_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, let me get out of your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，我给你让路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3A1_00007009_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] I will not be disrespected, nor lectured to, by some lowly guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]我不会被一个卑微的警卫所侮辱，也不会被他训斥。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lowly guard? You stupid cunt... I'll show you who--
ESP.TRADUIT: 卑微的警卫？你这个愚蠢的婊子......我要让你知道我是谁——
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3A2_0000700B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a second, you're the one Orphellum called through about, huh? Shit... look, I didn't mean anything by it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，你就是奥菲莉亚提到的那个人，是吗？妈的......你看，我不是故意的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3A2_0000700B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: C-Come on through! I'll get right out of your way, I promise!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快-快进来！我保证给你让路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3A2_0000700B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither. I'm here on business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都不是。我来这里是为了生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Business, huh? You people are all the same... you wanna talk to the boss, that's your problem, but you just missed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生意，是吗？你们都是一样的......你想和老板谈谈，那是你的问题，但你刚错过他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3B_0000700D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep going down and you'll run into him. Just don't say I didn't warn ya about his dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续往下走，你会遇到他的。只是别说我没警告过你他狗的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing3B_0000700D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much as I expected. You would do well to remember your place next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我所料。你下次最好记住你的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yeah... y-you win. Just... go on through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的......你-你赢了。只是......继续走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing4A_0000700F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dogs? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗？你在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't you hear? Boss's got some mean-looking mongrels following him now, ever since that slave cut him up good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听说吗？自从那个奴隶把老板砍伤后，他现在身边跟着一些凶神恶煞的杂种狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing4B_00007011_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's funny to just watch the cattle react, too... but you should be alright. Just don't get too close to risk rabies... you never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看那些牲畜的反应很有意思......不过你应该没事吧。只要别靠太近以免得狂犬病......谁知道呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Farthing [0500B2F7] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodFarthingVT\SunB_SunBFarthing4B_00007011_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't received word of any visitors coming through. What's your excuse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有收到任何访客到来的消息。你的借口是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath1_0000701B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have every right to be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有权在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep that up and I can show you to the cages. Now, report what exactly your business is here before I hit this button and bring down hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再这样下去，我可以带你去笼子。现在，在我按下这个按钮并带你去地狱之前，告诉我你到底来这里干什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath2_0000701D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Frumentarii already called through. I'm not your enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团特务已经通知过了。我不是你的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hmph. I don't know about that... but it saves me putting a bullet through your fucking skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]嗯。我不知道......但这省得我在你他妈的脑袋上开个洞了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath3_0000701F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna piss off the boss, be my guest. It's your ass. Go on through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想惹恼老板，请便。那是你的事。继续走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath3_0000701F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Mm... he called through about something all right. You don't think we've been watching your every move on the cams?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]嗯……他确实通知了什么。你以为我们没在摄像头上监视你的一举一动吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath3_00007020_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here, really? If you tell me straight up, I'll even make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底来这里干什么，说真的？如果你老实告诉我，我甚至可以让你死得快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath3_00007020_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you, I'm here for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉过你，我来这里是为了生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I'm an idiot? Maybe some time in one of the cells here will get you singing a different tune... that is, if you survive that long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我是白痴吗？也许在这里的某个牢房里待一段时间会让你唱出不同的调子......如果你能活得那么长的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath4A_00007022_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that didn't take long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这没花多长时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll take even less time once I get my hands on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一旦抓住你，时间会更短。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath4B_00007024_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to try your luck? Be my guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想试试运气吗？请便。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it when they try and fight back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢他们试图反抗的时候！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKath4C_00007026_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no... that ain't your toy to play with. Guards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不......那不是你的玩具。卫兵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kath [0500B306] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodKathVT\SunB_SunBKathAggro_00007031_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Hold fast, soldier. Help is here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]坚持住，士兵。救援来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank god... oh, I never thought I'd see the light of day again. But w-what are you doing here? How did you--
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢上帝......哦，我从没想过我会再见到阳光。但是，你-你怎么会在这里？你是怎么——
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant1A_00007038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be still. I'm not going to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别动。我不会伤害你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea how glad I am to hear that, stranger. I... I thought it was all over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道听到这句话我有多高兴，陌生人。我......我以为一切都结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant1B_0000703A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did they do to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对你做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgh, better question is what didn't they...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，应该问他们没做什么......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant2_0000703C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Tarrant, Sergeant First Class in the Mojave regiment of the New California Republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫塔兰特，新加州共和国莫哈维军团的一等中士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant2_0000703C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sent to investigate reports of people disappearing along the river. Unfortunately for me... I didn't bring more men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被派来调查沿河地区人口失踪的案子。不幸的是，我......没有带更多的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant2_0000703C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about what awaits ahead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道前面有什么在等着我们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgh... shit, I wish I could be more help, but they didn't exactly give me the grand tour of the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃......妈的，我希望我能帮上更多的忙，但他们并没有带我参观这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant3_0000703E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's another few levels, at least. I heard they have some kind of slave pits far below, where they use people for sport. Fucking animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少还有几层。我听说他们在下面很远的地方有一些奴隶坑，他们把人当作运动的工具。真他妈禽兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant3_0000703E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's going to be okay. You're getting out of here, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会没事的。你会离开这里的，士兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the best news I've heard in... well, weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我听到的最好的消息......嗯，几个星期了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant4_00007040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you able to stand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能站起来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Urgh, fuck... fuck me. I think I can manage it. Barely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，妈的......妈的。我想我可以应付。勉强可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant5_00007042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then come with me. Let's pay your captors back in kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就跟我来。让我们好好回报你的俘虏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aye, aye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunB_SunBTarrant6_00007044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you? What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你来这里干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could ask the same of you. The darkness closes in, but I could sense your approach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也可以这么问你。黑暗正在逼近，但我能感觉到你的接近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer1A_00007054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will wait. Until it is time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会等待。直到时机成熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer1B_00007056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this place a prison?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方是监狱吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. And no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是。也不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer2_00007058_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not very talkative, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不怎么健谈，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Master knows that all too well. I will not break, regardless of what he does.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人很清楚这一点。无论他做什么，我都不会屈服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer3_0000705A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master? Are you one of the slaves here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人？你也是这里的奴隶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slave? No... something more. He didn't like being cut where I struck, that much is clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...更复杂。他不喜欢被我砍到的地方，这一点很清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer4_0000705C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the man who runs this place. I'm not with the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我这个地方的管理者是谁。我和其他人不一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose there is no harm in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这没什么坏处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer5_0000705E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call him Maximus, second son to the Duport family that grew wealthy in the north-east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们称他为马克西姆斯，是东北部富商杜波特家族的次子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer5_0000705E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As callow as his father, he sought to strike out on his own by building an empire on the lives of others. Now, they call him The Breaker here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他父亲一样肤浅，他试图通过牺牲他人的生命来建立自己的帝国。现在，他们称他为“破坏者”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer5_0000705E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A master, but not mine. I am glad of what I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个主人，但不是我的。我很高兴我所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer5_0000705E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you come to be locked up in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么被锁在这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He believes his property is to do with as he pleases. That brought him closer and I took the opportunity to repay him in kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他认为他的财产可以随心所欲地处置。这使他离我越来越近，我趁机以牙还牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer6_00007060_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suffice to say, he will not have any heirs. No matter how he may scream and rage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，他将不会有任何继承人。无论他如何尖叫和愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer6_00007060_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. And what is it you're waiting for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。那么你在等待什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: An opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer7_00007062_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here, aren't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不就在这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed you are. Are you ready to kill anyone in your way? Even if that person doesn't resist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确实在。你准备好杀死挡在你路上的人吗？即使那个人不反抗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer8_00007064_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on. I'm not looking for a bloodbath here... I just need something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等。我可不想在这里大开杀戒...我只是需要一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As do I. Consider it an investment, to help balance the scales.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。就当是一种投资吧，来帮忙平衡局势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer9A_00007066_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it means getting what I need, then so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这意味着得到我需要的东西，那就这样吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel the exact same way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也有同样的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer9B_00007068_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let's move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The same applies to you, broken soldier. Get in my way and I will not hesitate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也一样，士兵。挡我的路，我会毫不犹豫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer10_0000706A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, lead on. This time, I will do much more than just cut him where it hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，带路。这一次，我会做的远不止是在他受伤的地方割一刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer10_0000706A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one they call Maximus is mine and mine alone. Now, lead on... it is time for him to learn of true horror.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们称之为马克西姆斯的人是我的，只是我一个人的。现在，带路......是时候让他知道真正的恐怖了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscPer10_0000706B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dear little flower... what an unexpected surprise. Maybe you need a reminder about what it means to leave your little cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我亲爱的小花......真是个意外之喜。也许你需要一个提醒，关于离开你的小牢房意味着什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP1_00007682_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more words. You have talked enough for the both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无需多言。你为我们说的话已经足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP2_00007684_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think you can kill me? Do you think you can lay a hand upon a Son of Mars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你能杀了我吗？你以为你能对一个战神之子动手吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP3_00007686_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have dined with Caesar himself! One word, and I will have you all flayed and left hanging in the sun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和凯撒本人共进过晚餐！一句话，我就会让你们所有人被剥皮挂在阳光下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP4_00007688_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First you and then your little friend. Last I heard, his headaches weren't looking too good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先是你，然后是你的小朋友。我最后一次听到他消息时，他的头痛不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP5_0000768A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stupid, stupid cunt. I will make you kneel. I will make you beg for forgiveness and you will break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个愚蠢的婊子。我会让你跪下。我会让你乞求宽恕，而你会崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP6_0000768C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are nothing more than a sad, little man. Do you think your dogs will stop me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是一个可悲的小人物。你以为你的狗会阻止我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP7_0000768E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, ah, ah... you don't want to be too hasty. It would be a shame to use the little detonator here so soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，啊，啊......你可不能太急躁。这么早就用这个小引爆器太可惜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP8_00007690_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And think of all those poor, innocent children...
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想那些可怜、无辜的孩子们......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMP9_00007692_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be the one to thank for stirring up the nest. How pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是那种感谢捅了马蜂窝的人。真可悲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax1_00007694_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that all you have to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就只有这些要说的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Acta Non Verba. Nice little phrase, isn't it? I'm no scholar in Latin, I don't care to be... what I am is a warrior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行动胜于雄辩。不错的短语，不是吗？我不是拉丁学者，我不在乎......我是战士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax2A_00007696_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, of all people, thought you could wander in here and strike at the heart of my empire. I will decimate you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，所有人，都以为你可以在这里游荡并打击我帝国的核心。我会消灭你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax2A_00007696_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should leave the two of you be. I'll just be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我应该让你们两个独处。我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is far too late for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在已经太迟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax2B_00007698_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the key. I won't ask again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把钥匙给我。我不会再问第二遍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Key? You came all that way for some little trinket? You really are out of your mind...
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？你走了这么远就是为了这么一个小玩意儿？你真是疯了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax3_0000769B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That old heirloom has been sitting here for decades. It's no use to anyone... and yet, I still won't let you take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那件旧传家宝已经在这里放了几十年了。它对任何人都没有用处......然而，我仍然不会让你拿走它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax3_0000769B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be smart about this. For once in your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 聪明点。你人生中只有一次这样的机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good is simple intelligence when I have the ear of a god!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我拥有神的耳朵时，简单的智慧有什么用！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax4A_0000769D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will sweep the Mojave on a wave of blood. I will hang Kimball from the walls of Hoover Dam by his guts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将在莫哈维的血海中横扫。我会把金博尔挂在胡佛水坝的墙上，用他的肠子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax4A_0000769D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is my hall and it bends to my decree!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的大厅，它服从我的法令！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax4A_0000769D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think your threats mean anything to me? I carved my way down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你的威胁对我有任何意义吗？我一路杀到这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmph... do you think any of the guards you killed meant anything to me? Every single one of them can be replaced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼......你以为你杀死的任何一个警卫对我有任何意义吗？他们每一个人都可以被替换。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax4B_0000769F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can bring every man, woman and child to their knees! I can tear through each and every town in this wasteland, rape and pillage on a whim!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以让每一个人，每一个女人和孩子都跪下！我可以随心所欲地摧毁这片废土中的每一个城镇，随意强奸、掠夺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax4B_0000769F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will take this world by the throat and I will make it mine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将扼住这个世界的喉咙，并让它臣服于我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax4B_0000769F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why haven't you? Because all you are is empty threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你为什么还没有做到？因为你所有的只是空洞的威胁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You dare...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax5_000076A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do. Now shut up already and die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是是是。现在闭嘴去死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your torment is just beginning...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的折磨才刚刚开始......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax6A_000076A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure talk a lot for someone who doesn't have any balls left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个已经没有勇气的人来说，你的话真不少。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I'm finished with you, you will beg for death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我搞定你后，你会乞求死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax6B_000076A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're quite finished, I have a proposal for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你已经说完了，我有一个提议给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this? More games? You're only delaying the inevitable...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？更多游戏？你只是在拖延不可避免的事情......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax6C_000076A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hand over the key and you can take them alive. Do whatever you want with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交出钥匙，你可以让他们活着。你想对他们做什么就做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hmm... the offer is... surprising.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]嗯......这个提议......令人惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax7A_000076A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. The trinket is yours... I don't ever want to see your face around here again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。小玩意儿是你的......我再也不想在这里看到你的脸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax7A_000076A9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You still think you've got an edge over me, huh? You won't take a single thing from me. I... I will have everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你还认为你对我有优势，是吗？你不会从我这里拿走任何东西。我......我会拥有一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax7A_000076AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it easy on everyone: stick a grenade in your mouth and pull the pin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让大家都轻松点：把手榴弹塞进嘴里，拔掉保险销。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will suffer a fate worse than death!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会遭受比死亡更悲惨的命运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscMax7B_000076AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在做什么？ ?!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tarrant [0500B307] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodTarrantVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscBetray1_000076B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: N-no... i-it won't end here... I won't go back...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不-不......我不会在这里结束......我不会回去......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscBetray2_000076B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the thing about hope... it makes you even easier to crush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望......它让你更容易被摧毁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscBetray3_000076BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不-不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscBetray4_000076BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你现在打算怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I was meant to do: purge the desert of people like him. Suffering and decay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我注定要做的：清除像他这样的人。苦难和衰败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscEnd1_000076C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was the first step. I won't rest until my last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是第一步。在我死之前我不会休息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscEnd1_000076C2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure you can make it out of here okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定你能从这里安全出去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mm. I thought I never would again, but I wish to stand in the rain. Through that, I am reborn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。我以为我再也不会了，但我希望站在雨中。在雨中，我获得了重生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscEnd2_000076C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your assistance in dealing with this wretch was... welcome. Perhaps our paths may cross again, in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮助我处理这个恶棍......我很感激。也许我们会在未来再次相遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscEnd2_000076C4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should get clear of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该离开这个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. Remember what has happened here this day... and I hope that we will not stand on opposite sides in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。记住今天在这里发生的事情......我希望我们将来不会站在对立面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Persephone [0500B308] (mod) Quest : ([06007035]SunBMisc) The Devil's Toys EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodPersephoneVT\SunBMisc_SunBMiscEnd3_000076C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Care to explain why you would interrupt my operation here? Why I shouldn't sic these two on you immediately and tear you limb from limb?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 介意解释一下为什么你要打断我的行动吗？为什么我不应该立刻让这两个人把你撕成碎片？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_SunBMax1_000076C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. You're too thick-headed to understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不。你头脑太简单了，无法理解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll learn why I will not be crossed... then you will be singing a different tune.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会知道为什么我不可冒犯...到时候你就会唱出不同的调子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_SunBMax2A_000076CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things didn't have to turn out like this. I came to talk, but your men got in the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情本不必如此。我是来谈话的，但你的手下挡了我的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me tell you something, you disgusting piece of filth. This is my hall and it bends to my decree!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我告诉你一件事，你这个令人厌恶的肮脏东西。这是我的大厅，它服从我的法令！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_SunBMax2B_000076CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: f you think you can wander in here and make demands, you are so, so wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你认为你可以在这里闲逛并提出要求，那你就大错特错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want the key. Nothing more, nothing less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要钥匙。不多不少。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Key? What key could possibly bring you this close to death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？什么钥匙能让你离死亡如此之近？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_SunBMax3A_000076CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what I'm here for. Now hand it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我来这里是为了什么。现在交出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't. But I will find out each and every little you know... whether you wish to tell me or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不知道。但我会找出你所知道的一切......无论你是否愿意告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_SunBMax3B_000076D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough stalling - I will have answers... even if I have to take it from your corpse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再拖延了——我要答案......即使我必须从你的尸体上得到它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maximus Duport [0500B902] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF2]SunB) Gorehound EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunBloodMaximusVT\SunB_SunBMax4_000076D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop right there. I don't care whether you've a scavver or a Fiend, there's nothing here for you to take, so why don't you walk right on out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就站在那里别动。我不在乎你是淘金客还是恶魔帮，这里没有你的东西，所以你为什么不离开这里呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa1_000094D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy. I don't even know who you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松。我甚至不知道你是谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mhm. You'll have to forgive me for not doing the same damn thing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。你得原谅我没有做同样该死的事......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa2A_000094D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you, what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你来这里干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa2A_000094D9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you put that down before someone gets hurt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不在有人受伤之前放下它？

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you haven't noticed, you're not in a position to bargain here. What the hell are you doing out this way? Vegas's in the other direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还没有注意到，你现在没有讨价还价的余地。你到底在这里干什么？维加斯在另一个方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa2B_000094DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to find a key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一把钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A key? Are you fucking serious? Do I look like a charity case to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？你是认真的吗？我看起来像是个慈善家吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa3_000094E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not just any key. It's a very particular one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是普通的钥匙。它很特别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, good-for-fucking-you. I don't know anything about no key, so it's time for you to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你真他妈的好运。我不知道什么钥匙，所以你现在该走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa4_000094E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem on edge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎很紧张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's called doing my damn job. Now, I don't know who you are and, frankly... I don't care. You just need to go. Don't make me pull the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这叫干我他妈的工作。现在，我不知道你是谁，而且......老实说......我不在乎。你只需要离开。别让我开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa5_000094E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for? Get!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在等什么？快走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa5_000094E4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have reason to believe it's here. Please, hear me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有理由相信它在这里。请，听我说完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Fine, fine... but I'm still gonna keep an eye on you, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，好吧......但我还是会盯着你，明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa6A_000094E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long as you don't draw on me or the old man, we won't have a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你不攻击我或那个老头，我们就不会有问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa6A_000094E6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, for fuck's sake... can't any of you wastelanders take a goddamn hint?!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]哦，看在上帝的份上......你们这些废土人难道就不能接受他妈的提示吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa6A_000094E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna make trouble, fine. Don't say I didn't warn you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想惹麻烦，好吧。别说我没有警告过你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa6A_000094E7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care who you are, either. I'm not budging.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不在乎你是谁。我不会让步的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you people always have to make this difficult...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们为什么总是要把事情搞得这么难......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa6B_000094E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not trying to cause trouble. Just give me the key and I'll go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想惹麻烦。把钥匙给我，我就走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good Lord, you are relentless, aren't you? Fine... fine. If you wanna poke around or talk to the old man, be my guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，你真是坚持不懈，不是吗？好吧......好吧。如果你想四处逛逛或和老人说话，请便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa7A_000094EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm warning you, if you hurt him, the little life you have left will be filled with torment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告你，如果你伤害了他，你剩下的那点生命将会充满痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa7A_000094EB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别挡我的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next time, take a fucking hint!
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次，接受他妈的建议！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Louisa Faraday [0500B2F5] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchLouisaVT\SunC_SunCLouisa7B_000094ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I didn't wish to disturb you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起。我不想打扰你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You remind me of my son... I... I haven't seen him in a while. I wonder where he's got to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我想起了我的儿子......我......我已经好久没见到他了。我想知道他去哪儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus1A_00009503_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know when it'll be time for dinner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么时候该吃晚饭了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus1A_00009503_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You remind me of my daughter... she said she was just going outside to deal with the farm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我想起了我的女儿......她说她只是出去处理农场的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus1A_00009504_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope she returns soon. I... I would like to spend dinner talking with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望她很快回来。我......我想和她共进晚餐，聊聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus1A_00009504_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm? Oh yes... yes, off you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，是的......是的，你去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus1B_00009506_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for something. I was wondering if you could help me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找东西。我想知道你是否能帮我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh dear... I'm too often looking for things myself nowadays. Good thing Louisa is here for me... why, I wouldn't know what to do with shoelaces!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪......现在我经常自己找东西。幸好露易莎在这里帮我......哎，我甚至不知道鞋带该怎么绑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus2_00009508_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't seen where I put my cane, have you? These old bones aren't what they used to be, I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没看到我把我的拐杖放在哪里了，是吗？这些老骨头已经不是以前的样子了，我知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus2_00009508_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I see... that's all right. No matter, child, no matter...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我明白了......没关系。没关系，孩子，没关系......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus3A_0000950A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it you wanted from me? I'm just an old man now... not much use to anyone...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想从我这里得到什么？我现在只是个老人......对任何人都没有什么用处......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus3A_0000950A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to focus. This is important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你集中注意力。这很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm? Oh yes, yes... that's fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，是的，是的......好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus3B_0000950C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where an old key might be kept?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道一把旧钥匙可能放在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A key? Why, I've had all sorts of keys over the years... ones for those collars we have, ones for doors, ones for lockers...
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙？哼，这些年来我什么样的钥匙没见过……有我们那些项圈上的，有门上的，还有储物柜的……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus4_0000950E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, but the only key I ever needed was the one to my wife's heart...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，但我唯一需要的钥匙是通往我妻子心中的钥匙......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus4_0000950E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a special key. It may have been handed to you when you were young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一把特别的钥匙。它可能在你年轻时被交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Special? I... why, I don't know what...
ESP.TRADUIT: 特别？我......为什么，我不知道什么......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus5_00009510_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you mean that old vault the stories spoke of. Ha, I never did see it myself...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你是说那些故事里讲的那个旧避难所。哈哈，我自己从来没见过......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus5_00009510_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you need to tell me where it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请，你必须告诉我它在哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dear me, why... I haven't thought about that in... a long, long time...
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，为什么......我已经很久没有想过这件事了......很久了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus6_00009512_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you still have it on you? Could it be somewhere in this house?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在你身上吗？它可能在这所房子的某个地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: House? This is the place I was born. Mother... mother should be home soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 房子？这是我出生的地方。妈妈......妈妈应该很快就回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus7_00009514_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen to me... I need you to think really hard, okay? This is important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说......我需要你认真想一想，好吗？这很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know anything about keys... I don't think so, anyway... why are you making this so difficult for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不知道任何关于钥匙的事情......我不这么认为，无论如何......你为什么要让我这么为难？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus8_00009516_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Reach out and gently lay your hand on his shoulder.] Take a deep breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: [伸出手，轻轻地把你的手放在他的肩膀上。]深呼吸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: O-okay... okay. I'm sorry... I'm just making a fool of myself again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好-好的......好的。对不起......我又在出丑了......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus9A_00009518_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, old man... either you hand it over or I beat it out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，老头......要么你把它交出来，要么我打到你交出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: N-no, please! Not the belt again, please! I-I'll do anything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不-不，求你了！不要用皮带打我，求你了！我-我会做任何事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus9B_0000951A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's okay. Just relax, we can go at your own pace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。放松点，我们可以按你自己的节奏来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I'm really, really sorry... I'm just a burden now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我真的很抱歉......我现在只是个负担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus10A_0000951C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea where that key could be. Louisa said I shouldn't carry those things on me, just in case I lost them again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道那把钥匙可能在哪里。露易莎说我身上不应该带这些东西，以防我再次弄丢它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus10A_0000951C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then hand over the fucking key!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就把该死的钥匙交出来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Argh - no! Louisa! Louisa, help me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊-不！露易莎！露易莎，救我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus10B_0000951E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could it be somewhere in the house, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那它可能在房子里的某个地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure... she did always keep things well organised. Perhaps... perhaps it could be. I did leave my glasses near the bed the other day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定......她总是把东西整理得井井有条。也许......也许可能。我前几天把眼镜放在床边了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus11_00009520_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or was it the shelf? Oh my, I just don't know... I'm sorry. I just don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是架子上？哦，天哪，我不知道......对不起。我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCAtticus11_00009520_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到钥匙了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm? Oh, good... I did wonder where I put that... And, uh... where did I put it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，好......我也想知道我把它放在哪里了......呃......我把它放在哪里了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCEnd1_00009523_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was on the shelf, but it's all right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在架子上，但现在没事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good... good. I... I think I'm going to rest now...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCEnd2A_00009525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I'll take good care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我会好好保管它的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good... good. I... I think I'm going to rest now...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Atticus Guellan [0500B905] (mod) Quest : ([05009AF3]SunC) Faded Memories EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunRanchAtticusVT\SunC_SunCEnd2B_00009527_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, sir and/or madam, to your home of the f-f-f-uture!
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎，先生和/或夫人，来到您的未-未-未来家园！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion1_0000D71B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Main power: offline. Critical system failure. Activating emergency generators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主电源：离线。关键系统故障。启动应急发电机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion2_0000D71D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hungry? This Tuesday only, the diner will be serving spit-roasted lamb with lemon tart for dessert. Mmm! Just like mama made it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 饿了吗？仅限本周二，餐厅将供应烤羊腿和柠檬馅饼作为甜点。嗯！就像妈妈做的一样......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion3_0000D71F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wah-oh! Where do you think you're going, sport! This one's for adults only...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇-哦！你以为你要去哪里，小子！这个只适合成年人......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion4_0000D721_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning: unauthorised access to mainframe detected. Unable to connect to mobile security platforms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告：检测到对主机的未授权访问。无法连接到移动安全平台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion5_0000D723_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter, bucko? You think you can shut me down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，老兄？你以为你能让我停机吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion6_0000D725_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh oh! Someone's poking round where they shouldn't be!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃哦！有人在不该去的地方闲逛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion7_0000D727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like... it's over...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion8_0000D729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good... night...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0600D121] (ID) Quest : ([050094F5]SunMaster) Ye Mighty and Despair EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Sun.esp\SunMiscVT\SunMaster_SunMasterDion9_0000D72B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Encounters at Mountain Shadows Campground
ESP.TRADUIT: 在山影营地遭遇

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Devil's Toys
ESP.TRADUIT: 魔鬼玩偶

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill the leader of the Blood Ministry with Persephone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和珀耳塞福涅杀死鲜血内阁首领。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Persephone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与珀耳塞福涅交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gorehound
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗜血成性

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the Blood Ministry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入鲜血内阁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Faded Memories
ESP.TRADUIT: 褪色的记忆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the ruined farmstead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查废弃的农场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ye Mighty and Despair
ESP.TRADUIT: 功业盖物,强者折服

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the ruins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查废墟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the three keys to unlock Vault Delta.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到三把钥匙来解锁德尔塔避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncover the secret of Vault Delta.
ESP.TRADUIT: 揭露德尔塔避难所的秘密。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Touch of Paradise
ESP.TRADUIT: 天堂之触

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the Garden of Delights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往极乐花园。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bird Or The Cage
ESP.TRADUIT: 笼中鸟

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Eli rescue his love from the Garden of Delights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助伊莱从极乐花园救出他的爱人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape with Eli and Jane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与伊莱和简一起逃脱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Jane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与简交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A fine layer of dust covers the surface of the panel as you idly tap the buttons to no avail.
Leaning forwards, you gently wipe your hand across to reveal three distinct keyholes on the side. Whether this is to keep people out or whatever lays ahead within remains unclear.
If only you had the keys... you could see what's hidden inside.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你无聊地敲击着按钮，面板表面覆盖着一层薄薄的灰尘。
你向前倾，轻轻用手一抹，露出侧面三个不同的锁孔。 这是为了防止人们进入还是里面有什么尚不清楚。
要是你有钥匙就好了......你就能看到里面藏着什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Pausing for a moment, you sniff the air and notice the faint smell of gas. Reaching forwards, the pipe appears to be possible to manipulate.
However, Persephone hangs behind your back and you can sense her restlessness to confront your quarry. There isn't time to do anything more.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你停顿了一下，嗅了嗅空气，注意到一股微弱的气味。 你向前伸手，发现管子似乎可以操作。
然而，珀耳塞福涅就在你身后，你能感觉到她急于追捕猎物。 没有时间做更多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Pausing for a moment, you sniff the air and notice the faint smell of gas. Reaching forwards, the pipe appears to be possible to manipulate.
Upon further examination, you notice the pipes lead into the room ahead and, with any luck, where the target of your search awaits. (Repair 50 or more required.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
你停顿了一下，嗅了嗅空气，注意到一股微弱的气味。 你向前伸手，发现管子似乎可以操作。
经过进一步检查，你注意到这些管子通向前面的房间，如果幸运的话，那里就是你搜寻的目标所在。 （需要50点或以上的修理技能。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ignite the gas
ESP.TRADUIT: 点燃煤气

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are currently in combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你目前处于战斗中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you look up, you notice the tiled rooftop is not too far out of reach. Out of sight of any guard, this could prove useful to move about the estate unnoticed. (Strength or Agility required.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你抬头看时，你注意到瓷砖屋顶并不太遥远。 在任何警卫的视线之外，这可能会帮助你在庄园中不被注意地移动。 （需要力量或敏捷。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jump and pull yourself up
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳上去并拉自己起来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slip quietly up onto the roof
ESP.TRADUIT: 悄悄溜上屋顶

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no use for this now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这东西没用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The door doesn't move. On closer inspection, it appears the mechanism has been tampered with and the manual override deliberately broken off.
You will have to find some other way to get it open. (Luck, Repair, Science, Strength or Explosives and C-4 required.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
门纹丝不动。仔细检查后，发现机关被改过，手动操作杆也故意被弄断了。
你必须找到其他方法打开它。（需要运气、修理、科学、力量或炸药和C-4。）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kindly ask the door to open
ESP.TRADUIT: 礼貌地请门打开

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fix the door
ESP.TRADUIT: 修门

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lubricate the gears
ESP.TRADUIT: 润滑齿轮

ESP.ORIGINAL: Force the door apart
ESP.TRADUIT: 把门撬开

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use C-4 to blast it open
ESP.TRADUIT: 用C-4炸开它

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether divine intervention or a trick of the eye, you can barely believe it as the door slides open without any resistance. Muttering to yourself is underrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论是神的干预还是眼睛的错觉，你几乎不敢相信门会毫无阻力地滑开。低估自言自语可不好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Being careful not to drop it, you remove the explosives from your pack and gently place it down before the jammed door. A simple shot should do the rest, but it might be a good idea to stand back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心翼翼地不让它掉下来，你从背包里取出炸药，轻轻地放在卡住的门前。 简单的一枪就能解决问题，但站远一点可能是个好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eli and Jane have died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莱和简已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It has long been said that with age comes experience and yet, as your heart skips a beat while the leathery old woman pulls you to a nearby tent, you're not sure how well that adage holds up.
Eventually you stop paying attention after her dentures accidentally pop out, leaving a slimy trail on your bare chest. Perhaps being shot in the head wasn't so bad after all.
ESP.TRADUIT:
人们常说，岁月会带来经验，但当这位皮肤松弛的老妇人把你拉进附近的帐篷时，你的心猛地一跳， 你不禁开始怀疑这句话是否真的正确。
最后，当她的假牙不小心掉了出来， 在你的胸膛上留下了一条黏糊糊的痕迹时，你干脆不再理会。 也许，被爆头也并不是那么糟糕的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Without a word, you allow Gabriel to lead you by the hand to a nearby tent. He quickly draws the curtains over and pushes you gently back onto the bed.
With a gentle caress, he slowly undresses you, planting a kiss on your skin as he goes. Soon enough, you feel yourself become sweaty as he presses in, his weight on top of you, and time begins to melt away.
Your eyes roll back in your head as you barely stifle a moan. It's just you now... you, him and the tent forms your whole world.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你一言不发，让加百列牵着你的手来到附近的一个帐篷。 他迅速拉上窗帘，轻轻地把你推回到床上。
伴随着温柔的爱抚，他慢慢地给你脱衣服，在你的皮肤上留下一个吻。 很快，当他压在你身上时，你觉得自己汗流浃背，时间开始融化。
你的眼睛在你的脑袋里翻腾着，你几乎抑制不住呻吟。 现在只有你了......你、他和帐篷构成了你的整个世界。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Persephone has died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 珀耳塞福涅死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Without even realising it, you feel your legs grow weak as you're pulled down onto the bed. May pulls the curtains to the tent across, leaving only the dim glow from the light outside.
A comforting warmth nestles in gently by your side and soon both your hands and hers are wandering, kneading and exploring every inch. Every crevice.
The musky scent of her perfume hangs heavy in the air as you press in against each other. Perhaps the Garden does live up to its name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你甚至没有意识到自己的双腿变得无力，被拉到床上。 梅将帐篷的窗帘拉上，只留下外面昏暗的灯光透进来。 一种温暖舒适的感觉悄悄依偎在你身边， 很快，你们的手开始相互游走，揉捏着，探索着对方的每一寸肌肤。 每一个缝隙都不放过。 空气中弥漫着她麝香味的香水，你们紧紧相拥。 也许，这个“乐园”确实名副其实。
